lha mo brgyad kyi bskor// de ltar tshe bum gzhal yas na// lha tshogs gsal bar bsgom nas ni// tshe bum mgul nas bzung thag gdags// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal bsgaum la// oM AHhUM hrIH oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ yi ge bcu pa'i bsnyen pa bya// de nas tshe yi bsgrub pa ni// oM A hUM traM hrI ha/ bruM badzra A yu she a sad+d+h-I sid+d+hi hUM// zhes pa'i 'phro 'du yis// bdag nyid thugs rje chen po yi// thugs ka'i hri las 'aud 'phros pas// bum pa'i nang gi lha la thim// lha rnams thugs bskul 'od zer gyis// stong gsum tshe yi bcud bsdus nas// tshe'i bum lha rnams thugs kar 'dus// lha yi thugs nas tshe yi bcud// bdag dang sgrub byed snying kar thim// 'chi med tshe dang ldan par bsgom// rgyas gdab tshe yi srungs ma rung// snying gi sgo srungs rta mgrin bsgom// tshe chang khol dang drod rnyed nas// dngos grub blangs te rol par bya// tshe yi sid+d+hi thob par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'chi med tshe bsgrub kyi le'u ste sum cu so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dngos grub bsgrub pa bya ba ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dngos grub bsnyen pa byed 'dod na// gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsi dang// mchod rdzas rnams kyang rgya cher bsham// phyi yi mchod pa rgya cher bsham// tshogs dang zhal zas sna tshogs la// 'byor tshogs rgyas par bshams nas ni// dus bzhir mchod cing bsgrub pa bya// de nas mtshams gcod sngon 'gro bya// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la// bzhugs gsol phyag btsal mchod pa dang// gnyis su med par bstim pa dang// bstod cing gsol ba gdab pa dang/ khyad par tshogs mchod rgya chen bya// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa bya// dngos grub blang zhing lce la bzhag/ gtor ma rak+ta tshogs kyis bskang// mar me tshe la sogs pas bskang// lha la bstod pa byas nas ni// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba dang// dus bzhir mchod cing 'dzab bzlas bya// oM AHhUM/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes pa 'dzab tu bzlas pa yis// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'od zer 'phraus pa yis// 'khor gyi lha rnams thugs kar phog/ 'khor gyi thugs

nas phyir 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa la// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa phul/ khams gsum sems can sgrib pa sbyangs// thugs rje chen po'i sku ru gyur// tshur 'dus sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdus// dus bzhir mchod cing 'dzab tu bzlas// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma bya// bsgrub pa grub pa'i rtags byung nas// tha ma'i nub mo dngos grub blang// dngos grub rdzas kyi rnam pa ni// zla rgyas zla phrom dza gad dang// tshe dang am ril gal phyi dang// maM sa 'ge 'u skyu rum dang// bran pho bran mo kun tu rgyug/ dngos grub rdzas dang 'byor tshogs bshams// lha la bskul zhing dngos grub blang// yi ge bcu pa'i bsnyen sngags la// kA ya bA ka tsit+ta sarba sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM// zhes pa bzlas/ steng 'og bar gsum lha klu mi'i// bdud rtsi zas dang rtsi mchog dang// sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi blang// dngos grub rdzas kyi dbang bskur la// phud kyi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod// rdo rje slob dpon mched lcam rol// bkra shis brjod cing glu bro bya// slob dpon yon dbul mnyais byas nas// gtor ma gtang la gtor gzhong gnon// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su+u gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rim par bsdu// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor sa tshon bsdu// chu bo'i gzhung la bskyal bar bya// de nas spyod lam ci bder bya// thugs rje chen po'i sid+d+hi thib// ces gsungs so// thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gsum pa'o//// thugs rje chen po gsang sngags kyi bsgrub pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la// 'jig rten dbang phyug yang zhus pa// e ma rdzaugs pa'i sangs rgyas sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa lags// thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// 'phrin las las tshogs ji ltar bsgrub// rdzaugs sangs rgyas kyi bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// rdzaugs sangs rgyas kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// de la zhi ba'i las bsgrub na// yid 'ong bkra shis dben gnas su// gtsang zhing dkar ba'i sa blangs la// maN+Dal zlum po byas nas ni// dri zhim sman gyi dri yi byug/ me tog dkar po bkram nas ni/ khrus byas dkar gsum zas la rten// gtor ma dkar po bshams nas ni// bum pa dkar po chu yis dgang// tsan dan dkar dang dmar gyis brgyan// ras dkar gtsang mas mgul chings bya// gzungs thag dkar po btags nas ni// maN+Dal dbus su bzhag nas ni// bdag nyid thugs rje chen por bsgaum// gzungs thag dkar po bzung nas ni// bum pa lha yi gzhal yas khang// hrI las byung

ba'i spyan ras gzigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams// zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// hri yi 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba ni// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ pa smi pa na shan tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa'i gsang sngags grub pa dang// bum pa chu yis bkrus nas ni// las dang sgrib pa yongs dag nas// 'jigs pa kun las rab grol te// rgyal pos 'jigs dang dmag gis 'jigs// chom rkun 'jigs dang gcan gzan 'jigs// lce 'bab me yis 'jigs pa dang// sbrul gdug chu yis 'jigs pa dang// 'jigs pa brgyad las thar bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed 'dod na// tsan dan dkar po'i shing la ni// bkra shis gnas nas me blangs sbar// dur ba'i rtsa dang 'bras kyi 'dab// til dang yungs kar pu rtse la// gong gi sngags bzlas me la bsreg/ myur du zhi ba'i las 'grub 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// zhi ba'i las tshogs kyi le'u ste sum cu so bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyas pa'i las ni bsgrub 'dod na// nags tshal 'thug po me tog can// nyams dga' sa gzhi ser po ru// gtsang ba sa ser legs blangs la// tsan dan ser po'i dri chus byug/ 'bras bu bcas pa'i me tog ni// ser po'i tshom bu bkram nas ni// rin chen sna lnga 'bru snar bcas// rin chen bum par blug par bya// maN+Dal dbus su legs bzhag la// gzungs thag ser po gdags par bya// bdag nyid rgyan btags gos ser gon// thugs rje chen po'i skur bsgom la// gzungs thag ser po gzung nas ni// bum pa lha yi gzhal yas khang// hri las byung ba'i spyan ras gzigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa bum pa bsnams// nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam// hri yi 'phro 'du sbyor ba yis// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ rat+na gu na push+tiM ku ru swA hA// zhes pa'i gsang sngags grub ba dang// bang mdzod la sogs khyim rnams ni// 'bru dang rin chen nor gyi dbyig/ mi mdzad myur du khengs par 'gyur// tshe dang dpal dang dbang thang yang// 'byor pa chen po thob par 'gyur// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byed 'dod na// tsan dan shing la gru bzhir rtsig gtor ma ser po bsham nas ni// ku sha star bu shug 'brum dang// ser chen me tog ser po la// sngags bzlas tsan dan me la bsraig/ phyug po'i khyim nas me blangs sar// rgyas pa'i las rnams dmyur du 'grub// ces gsungs so// rgyas pa'i las tshogs kyi le'u ste sum cu so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dbang gi las ni grub 'dod na/ sdud par byed pa chu klung 'gram/ kha dog dmar po zla gam dbyibs// de lta bu yi gnas su ni// sa dmar gtsang

zhing legs pa la// me tog dmar po bu ram dang// sbrang rtsi ka ra'i ri lu bya// bse khab dmar po'i nang du gzhug/ gang la dmigs pa'i gzugs bcug la// me tog dmar po btab nas ni// maN+Dal dbus su bzhag par bya// gzungs thag dmar po btag nas ni// bdag nyid thugs rje chen por bsgoms// hri las byung ba'i lha mo ni// lcags kyu thogs pa bsam nas ni// gang la dmigs pa'i snying nas ni// lcags kyu drangs nas bkug par bsam// oM ma Ni pad+me huM// che ge mo pas shang mi ku ru swA hA/ zhes bzlas// lha dang mi yi bu mo khugs// rgyal po la sogs dbang chen dang// log lta dgra 'dre la sogs pa// gang dmig gzugs ni khrag gis bris// bse khab zang khab kha sbyar gzhug/ ye ge drug pa'i sham bu ru// che ge mo b+hasmi pa shang ku ru swA ha/ zhes bzlas/ gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// rgyal po rje dpon slob dpon dang// ma ma lta bur mos par 'gyur// dbang gi sby-in sreg byed 'dod na// mdzo mo'i shing la sogs pa la// dbyibs ni zla gam brtsigs nas ni// gtor ma dmar po bshams nas ni/ khre dang ju tse sran ma la// sngag bzlas pad+ma'i me 'bar bsreg/ nus pa mchog tu yongs 'gyur te// gang la bya ba log lta rnams// thams cad bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dbang gi las tshogs kyi le'u te sum cu so drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mngon spyo drag po'i las byed na// dur khrod shing gcig 'dre gnas su// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// dug dang khrag gi nag por byug/ me tog sngon po bkram nas ni// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// lcags sam kham nag zur gsum du// gang la bya ba'i ming rus gzhug kha sbyar staing du bug pa btod// yung dkar yungs nag lcags phye la// bsngags la thun du brab bar bya// bdag nyid thugs rje chen por bsgom/ khro bo nag po mtshon gang thogs// gang la bya ba gsod dang 'ching// gang dmigs las rnams byed par 'gyur// oM ma Ni pad+ma hUM/ che ge mo a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ dgra bgegs gang dmigs tshar gcod 'gyur// drag po'i sbyin sreg byed 'dod na// dug shing tsher ma can gyi shing// dbyibs ni zur gsum dag tu brtsig/ me ni yug sa'i khyim nas blangs// gtor ma nag po bshams nas ni// bra bo sran ma til nag la// sngags btab bsregs na myur du 'grub// dgra bgegs gdug pa tshar gcod 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// mngon spyod kyi las tshogs kyi le'u ste sum cu so bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las bzhi rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo ni// gro gar ras sam shing shun la// 'khor lo rtsibs drug yi ge drug/ dbus su hri yis mtshon pa bri// rtsibs mchan shAn ting ku

ru swA ha/ ra dkar 'o ma dung gis bkru// dngul lam dkar po'i ga bur gzhug/ sngags bzlas mchod na zhi ba 'grub// yung ba'i chu yis khor lo bri// pun+TiM ku ru swA hA// rtsibs kyi mtshams su bri bar bya// gser ram ra gan ga 'ur gzhug/ sngags bzlas mchod na rgyas pa grub// mtshal dang pad+ma'i khrag gis bri// pa smi ku ru swA hA/ rtsibs mchan la ni bri bar bya// zangs kyi gab rtser gzhug par bya// sngags bzlas tshe na dbang du 'gyur// nim pa'i chu dang snag tshas bris// mA ra ya rbad rtsibs mchan la ni bri bar bya// lcags kyi gab rtser gzhug par bya// drag po'i thun du brabs pas ni// gang la bya ba 'chi bar 'gyur// shog bu dag la snang tshas bris/ yang na mtshal lam gur kum bri/ gser dang dngul gyis bris na rab// pad+ma 'dab ma drug pa la// dbus su hri bri pad+ma la// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM zhes pa bri/ mu khyud rten 'brel sngags kyi bskor/ la cha'i ri lur dril nas ni// tshon gyi pad+ma rin chen brgyan/ mgul lam dpung pa g.yas g.yon bcang// bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba dang// lus la bcangs pas byang chub thob// oM ma Ni pad+ma hUM/ gzhan yang 'jigs pa brgyad bsrung ba// rgyal pos 'jigs pa bsrung ba la// rgyal po'i lto bar 'khor lo bri/ yi ge drug pa'i sham bu ru// rA ga staM b+ha ya hUM hUM// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas bcing// bcings nas chu bo'i gzhung la bskur// rgyal po'i chad pa dag las thar// chom rkun dgra yis 'jigs pa la/ mi bzugs nang du 'khor lo bri/ yi ge drug pa'i sham bu ru// dgra dang gnod pa thams cad kha ting stam pa ya hUM hUM/ zhes pa bzlas la rgya gram lam du mnan// dgra dang rkun mo 'ching bar 'gyur// gcan gzan 'jigs pa bsrung ba la// lce spyang stag sogs kha 'thams pa'i// lte bar 'khor lo bris nas ni/ gtso bo che dang dril nas ni// lus la btags sam sgau la btag/ yi ge drug pa'i sham bu ru// ri tiM pri ti ka go la stam pa ya hUM hUM/ gcan gzan 'jigs pa 'ching bar 'gyur// dug sbrul 'jigs pa bsrung ba ni// sbrul gyi lto bar 'khor lo bri/ gla rtsi shing kun lus byugs la// 'khor lo lus la bcangs nas ni// ha la ha la bi sha bi sha staM hUM hUM/ sbrul dang klu gdug 'ching bar 'gyur// lce 'bab thog gis 'jigs pa la// thog rus me ri'i nang du ni// 'khor lo bris la thog rus dang// rin chen sna lnga spyi bor bcing// badzra dz+wa la dz+wa la staM pa ya hUM hUM/ yi ge drug dang spail la bzlas// lce 'bab thog gis 'jigs mi 'gyur// me yi 'jig pa bsrung ba la// me ri'i nang du 'khor lo bri// 'brug rus chu shel lus la bcang// dz+wa la a ni staM pa ya staM pa ya hUM hUM/ chu la btab la me la gtor// yang na sa la btab la gtor// yi ge

drug dang sbrel nas ni// me yis 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur// chu yis 'jigs pa bsrung ba ni// chu ris nang du 'khor lo bri/ bi da ra ni staM pa ya hUM hUM/ yi ge drug dang sbrel nas ni// sa la bsngags te chu la gtor// 'khor lo kham pa'i gab tse ni// so btang las byas sbyar nas ni// chu snar bcug na chu sna bzlog/ lus la 'khor lo bcangs pa ni// chu yi 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// dus min 'chi bas 'jigs pa la// rdo rje'i nang du 'khor lo bri// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM// A yu tshe bruM yu bruM ni hUM hUM/ bla g.yu mig med 'khor lo dril// de yang la cha'i ri lur dril/ rdo rje rgya gram rgyas btab la// mgul btag mchan khung g.yon par bcang// sngags bzlas lus dang ma bral na// dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// bcu thub pa yang brgya thub 'gyur// 'khor lo las kyi kha tshar gyi le'u ste sum cu so brgyad pa'o//// 'phrin las las tshogs kyi skabs te gsum pa'o///// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni// e ma ho// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rgyud 'di'i mtshan ni ji ltar lags// rgyud 'di dar ba'i sa ni gang du 'byung// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' stsal pa// rgyud 'di thugs rje chen po yi// bsgrub thabs ma lus ston pas ni// bsgrub thabs nges par ston pa'i rgyud// thug rje chain po thugs dgongs bcad// ma lus 'di ru ston pas na// rang byung ye shes phyi ma'i rgyud// rgyud 'di dar nas 'byung ba'i dus// lho phyogs 'dzam bu gling gi dbus// dbu rgyan d+ha na ko sha ru// mngal las ma skyes pad+ma las// rdzus te sku 'khrungs sprul sku las// nga yi lung bstan 'bab par 'gyur// de nas mtha' 'khob kha ba can// bod ces bya bar ston par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po'i btan pa 'byung// zhes gsungs so// rgyud 'di o rgyan pad+ma yis// brag phug ma ra ti ka ru// tshe yi rigs 'dzin bsgrub dus su// sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyis// lung bstan rgyud 'di bka' babs byung// bod yul gdong dmar srin po'i rigs// gdul phyir rgyud 'di bsgyur nas ni// phyi rabs don du gter du sbas// las can gcig dang 'phrad gyur nas/ ma spel sgro skur sar song na// byin rlab dngos grub yal bar 'gyur// bcangs na dngos grub chog thob 'gyur// gal te rgyud 'dzin snod ldan m-i// bla ma'i bka' bzhin byed pa dang/ khong gi snying ltar brtse sems nas// skad cig 'bral bar mi sems na// de la rgyud 'di gtad par bya// bstan pa'i sgron me byed par shog/ ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa dang// thugs rje chen po'i bstan pa 'byung

dus bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu so dgu pa'o//// thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi bsgrub thabs bstan pa ye shes rang byung gi rgyu phyi ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsit+ta ma hA ka la tsa ra pa tha ta tan+t+ra/ tsit+ta ma hA du kha sarba sa ha la na mo// bod skad du// 'phags pa thugs rje chen po mgon po 'khor ba dong sprug gi rgyud// thugs rje chen po sdug bsngal tham cad zhi bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyi zhing khams za ma tog bkod pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'khor lha dang/ klu dang/ gza' dang/ rgyal po chain po bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong ba bcu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la sogs te bye ba phrag nyis brgya dang/ mkha' 'gro ma pad+ma gar gyi dbang mo la sogs te/ mkha' 'gro drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor nas thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe mkha' 'gro pad+ma gar gyi dbang mos// sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med lags// 'gro don 'phr-in las dzad pa'i phyir thugs rje chain po'i gnas dang rang bzhin bstan du gsol ces zhus pas/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang mo rna ba'i dbang po sgra la nyon cig/ ces 'od dpag tu med pas bka' stsal to// de nas yang pad+ma gar gyi dbang mos yengs pa med pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs te/ de nas sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pas bka' stsal pa/ thugs rje chen po bzhug pa'i gnas ni ri po ta la'i rtse mo la/ brag thams cad pad+ma sna tshogs kha bye ba 'dra ba/ dbyar dgun ston dpyid nam la dus bzhir me tog dang 'bras bu skam pa med pa/ me tog pad+ma dang/ pad+ma stong ldan dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ me tog sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ brag thams cad la thugs rje chen po rigs phyag stong spyan stong baM dang/ spyan ras gzigs dang/ mkhar sa pa Ni dang/ seng ge sgra dang/ don yod zhags pa dang/ 'khor ba dong sprugs dang/ ha ya gri ba la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rtse zhing/ nags tshal ri brag thams cad sku rang byung du bzhugs so// sgra chu sgra rlung sgra la sogs pa thams cad yig 'bru bdun pa'i sgra'o// gnas pa'i srog chags phag mo dang/ phug ron dang/ rngon pa dang/ bram ze pho mo dang/ tsher ma 'don pa dang/ pad+ma'i sdong po la lo ma dang 'bras bu sna tshogs smin pa/ nyi zla'i 'od kun tu khyab pa'o// rang bzhin ni dus gsum sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rang bzhin/ gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas 'gro drug 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du don

byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin/ mtho srid pa'i rtse mo nas dma' 'jag ma'i srin bu yan chad la khyab pas theg pa chen po'i rang bzhin/ gtsang smre gtsang dang gzem rtog med par don byed pas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'khor bar don mdzad kyang 'khor ba'i skyon kyis ma gos te/ mya ngan 'das pa'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// yang pad+ma gar gyi dbang mo zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// 'gro don 'phrin las mdzad pa'i phyir// phyi bsgrub 'gro don bcas pa cig/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ gar gyi dbang mo nyon cig/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ tshad med rnams bzhi bsgaum par bya// bdun ni rnam dag tshogs bsags la// dang po stong pa nyid du bsgaum// rang sems yi ge hriHlas ni// baM las sna tshogs pad+ma las// de steng b+hUM las gzhal yas khang// pad+ma 'dab drug mu khyud ldan// gru chad sgo dang bcas pa la// rin chen rgyan gy-is brgyan pa bskyed// de dbus nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// de stengs hrIHyi 'phro 'du las// mgon po 'khor ba dong sprugs ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pa shes rab ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu la brgyan// rta mgrin rgyal po thugs kar gsal// shel 'phreng brgya rtsa do shal brgyan// rin po che yi rgyan dang ldan// 'dzum zhal bcas bzhugs thugs kha nas// pad+ma 'dab drug hriHyig las// yi ge drug pa'i 'phreng bar bsam// hrIH 'phros yi ge drug pa las// bcom ldan sprul sku thub pa drug/ sku mdog phyag rtags phyag mtshan 'dzin// rigs drug so so 'dul phyir sgom// dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed pa dang// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab cing// dbang bskur rgyas gdab byas nas ni// snying kha'i hriHlas 'od 'phros nas// ye shes sems dpa' spyan dras la// mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs su sol// phyag btsal mchod pa dbul lags kyi/ de nas 'das pa'i rim pa yi// bdag dang ye shes sem dpa' gnyis// nyi zla pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor hrIHyig la// 'od zer bsnaul mar sngags brjod pas// phar 'phros ye shes sems dpa' mnyes/ tshur 'dus sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// gang 'dod don du bzlas pa bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon dang/ 'bru bdun skyon rnams spangs la bzlas pa bya// de nas bskyed rim gtong 'dod na// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' hrIHla bsdus// hrI las mi dmig gsal stong bsgom// de las langs te chos spyod ci rig bya/

dge ba sems can don du bsngo// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing dbang bskur bya// sbyin sreg bya zhing sgrib pa sbyangs/ khrus gsol 'khor ba dong nas sprug/ gtor ma chab gtor btang ba dang// sbyin pa btang zhing skye sgo dgag/ byang chub lam sna drang bar bya// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ phyi bsgrub 'gro don dang bcas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// yang pad+ma gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa// kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// nang bsgrub dngos grub bcas pa cig/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du sol// zhes zhus pas// gar gyi dbang mo nyon cig/ bde gshegs kun 'dus sangs rgyas kyis// thugs rje chen por dbang bskur ba'i// 'khor ba dong sprugs dkyil 'khor bstan// thugs rje chen po lha yi lha// dkyil khor kun gyi byed pa po// bkra shis byin chags nyams dga' bar// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag tu// sa brtag sa yi cho ga bya/ chag chag gdab cig sngon 'gro yan lag gzung// thig gdab sa tshon byin gyis brlabs// legs par bri zhing rgyan rnams dgod// dkyil 'khor tshon skud dra bar gzhug/ bum pa dbang rdzas gtor ma dang/ bdud rtsi rag ta tshogs 'khor bshams// mchod pa rnam lnga 'byor tshad bstar// de nas sku gsung thugs kyi rten// tsa ka li dang yig 'bru dang/ phyag 'tshan la sogs dgod par bya/ spyan drangs bzhugs gsol phyag dang mchod pa la/ gnyis su med par bstim par bya// mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa dang/ tshogs dang gtor mas dus bzhir bskang/ bdud rtsi byin rlabs sman mchod bya// dngos grub blang dang gtor ma rak+ta tshaugs kyis bskang// mar me tshe dbul 'dzab bzlas bya// lha bkod dbang dang dngos grub blang// dus bzhir mchod cing bzlas pa bya// dus grangs mtshan rtag byung nas ni// dngos grub rdzas rnams 'byor tshad bsham// lha la bskul cing dngos grub blang// dngos grub rdzas kyi dbang bskur bya// phud kyis dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod// gtod mas chos skyong srung ma bskang// rdo rje slob dpon mched lcam rol// lhag mas bkra shis klu bro bya// gtor ma phyir gtang gtor gzhong mnan/ ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rim pas bsdu/ dal bsdu spyo lam ci bder bya// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyu las/ nang bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhis bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// yang pad+ma gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ nang bskor thig le gcig tu bsgrub pa cig/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// gar gyi dbang

mo nyon cig dang po skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya// tshad med bzhi ldan ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// bskyed rdzogs rim pa bzhin du bsgom// hrIHyi 'phro 'du'i ting 'dzin gyi// phyi nang nyon mongs sgrib kun sbyangs// bsod nams tshog bsags mchod pa dbul// bsod nasam tshogs ni bsags pa'o// sdig sgrib ma lus sbyong ba'o// dge ba bcu yi lam brten nas// mtha' yas sems can thams cad kyi// sgrib gnyis ma lus sel bar byed// 'bru bdun sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// byang chub mthar phyin bsgrub pa'i lam// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ thig le chig rdzogs su bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// mi rtog gnyis med nam mkha'i ngang// rang byung rang shar chos kyi sku// gsal 'grib med par longs spyod rdzogs// kun snang sprul pa'i sku la bstod// oM ni brdal khyab kun gzhi byang chub sems// 'khor 'das 'byung khungs rgyu 'bras lam gyi mchog/ gdod nas skye med 'od gsal kun 'byung rig pa'i gter// ma yengs 'gro don nyi ma'i 'od// thig le stong pa kun ldan spro bsdu bral// ma nor rang byung nyes pa'i skyon dang bral// dri med zung 'jug nyon mongs skyon bral tshogs gnyis rdzogs// pad+ma'i spyan ldan gsal byed sgrol ma'i ngang// ye shes snang gsal gzung 'dzin mtshan ma bsreg/ mthar phyin dgongs pa ma rtsal lhun gyis grub// dgag bsgrub dbyer med snying po'i don la bstod// snang ba dag pas spyan 'dren gnyis med bzhugs// sgo gsum rnam dag gus pas bdag phyag 'tshal// sdig sgrib dam tshig nyams chag skong// gnyis med mchod 'bul sdig sgrib bshags// rjes su yi rang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ mya ngan mi 'da' rjes su bzhugs// mi dge sdig sbyang skye 'gro thugs rjes zung// zhabs drung skye bar smon cing sems can don du bsngo// rin chen maN+Dal me tog mdzes pas brgyan// gling bzhi gling 'phran dag pa yi// ri rab nyi zla skar mas brgyan// rin chen sna bdun gter chen brgyad kyis brgyan// rnam dag maN+Dal mchod pa'i mchog/ brdal ba chen po rgya chab dus gsum sangs rgyas mnyan byed pa// bsam mi khyab kyi maN+Dal du// spang blang med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ rnam dag chen po'i maN+Dal 'bul// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba dongs sprugs kyi rgyud las/ bstod bshags maN+Dal dbul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// yang gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid cig/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ gar gyi dbang mo sgra nyon cig/ thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// thugs ni yang dag

gong na med// rje ni de skyes byed pa'o// thugs ni chos nyid mi 'gyur ba// rje ni 'gag pa med pa'i don// nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam sem can la// theg chen 'grau ba'i don mdzad pa// 'phrin las 'bras bu'i don ston pa/ khyab brdal theg pa chen po la// gsung sgrags snyan pa chen po sgrogs// grag stong gsung gi mtshan 'dzin pa// gsung mchog chen po sgra yis rgyal// sgra don 'bru bdun mthar phyin lam// sku mchog rgyas pa'i 'od zer can// shin tu mdzes shing blta na sdug/ mtshan dang dpe byad longs spyod rdzogs// bzhin bzang nyon mong zil gyis gnon// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med// 'dod chags chu bo skems par byed// bde gsheg rigs drug 'khor du bskor// pha rol phyin drug lam bgrod na// sku drug ye shes drug ldan pa// sku drug bde gshegs thugs rje'i ngang// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// dgos 'dod re skong rigs lnga 'bras bu sbyin// 'khor ba'i gcod rnying mthar dbyung ba// thugs rje 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bsgral// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa po// yang dag don la rnam par gnas// rnam dag chen po'i lam gyi mchog/ thugs rje'i mtha' ste kun tu khyab// ye shes bde ba rgyun chad med// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can// dus gsum bde gsheg thams cad kyis// thug rje chen por dbang bskur te// thugs rjes bstan pa'i mnga' bdag pos// skye med yang dag mtha' las rgyal// 'bru bdun tshangs pa'i gsung dang ldan// ye shes sku ste 'od dang ldan// bcu gcig zhal ni so sor mtshon// mos pa tha dad sems can kun// dbyer med mtshan ni so sor gzung/ phyag stong 'khor lo sgyur ba de// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i stobs po che// spyan stong rnam par dag par gzigs// dri med pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan// zhal gcig phyag bzhis rnam par brgyan// 'phrin las bzhi yi don dang ldan// phyag gnyis shes rab thabs kyi 'gro ba 'dren// dpa' bo 'khor ba'i gnyen gcig po// 'dzum zhal sdug bsngal zhi bar byed// 'jam zhing mdzes pa'i sku ston pa// nyon mongs dug lnga zhi bar byed// ma nor lam ston lha yi mchog/ sku dog le brgan dbang gi mdangs// yang dag don la skye ba med// dkon mchog gtso ste thub pa drug/ rgyud drug lam gcod dpa' bo che// thub drug sangs rgyas las byung ba// rgyan med sprul pa'i rang bzhin las// dgra bcom rgyal po zag pa zad// srid pa'i dra ba rgya mtsho 'joms// ye shes me 'od nyon mongs dgra chen kun 'dul ba// ma rig mun pa sel bar byed// sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu ldan// pha rol phyin drug lam rten pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// lam rnams bgrod pa'i thabs su

gsungs// zhes pas/ 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ thug rje chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// yang gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa// kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ thugs rje chen po'i 'phrin las cig/ bdag cag rnams la bstan cing bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// gar gyi dbang mo sgra la nyon cig/ zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhi yi 'phr-in las ni// dang po sngon 'gro lags byas la// ngan song sbyang dang dbang du bsdu// drag po 'dul dang la sogs pa// kun la sems bskyed drag pos gzung// dad pas laug pa'i lta ba zhi// byams pas zhe sdang drag po zhi// snying rje phrag dog rtsub mo zhi/ dga' bas bdag tu lta ba zhi// btang snyoms mtha' dang rtog pa zhi// tshad med bzhi yi ngang la gnas// mthar thug byams pa'i sems dang ldan// snyi rje'i thabs kyi 'dzin par byed// sems can don la phyogs med dga'// thugs rje mkha' dang mnyam par khyab// yang dag zhi ba'i mthu dang ldan// rin chen rgyas pa'i las la 'jug/ ting 'dzin rgyas par don byed pa// rig pa'i dbang gi ye shes rgyas// sems kyi rang bzhin skye med las// skye ba med pa'i cho 'phrul sems// rig pa'i ngo bo thig le byang chub sems// gsang ba'i dbang gi bde ba rgyas// thig le byang chub sems las 'du 'bral med// bde ba chen por skye med dbyings// thig le 'od gsal ngang la gnas// gsum pa'i dbang gi mi rtog rgyas// mi rtog spros med chos kyi dbyings// chos dbyings don la skye ba med// skye med gnas lugs chen po'i ngang// bzhi pa'i dbang gi zag med rgyas// chos sku skye med zag pa med// zag med bde ba chen po'i sku// gzung 'dzin dri ma kun dang bral// lam du khyer bas chos sku rgyas// chos kyi sku ste 'od gsal don// ma bcos ma bslad rang la gnas// 'od gsal skye med don dang ldan// sems kyi snang ba dbang du byas/ snang ba thams cad rang gi sems// sems kyi cho 'phrul snang ba yang// skad cig thig le don du gcig/ mos pas byin rlabs dbang du byas// mos gus don dag gnyis med don// skad cig mos pas don rnams rtogs// gnyis snang rtog pa'i 'gyu ba chad// 'bad pas dngos grub dbang du byas// 'bad rtsol sems nyid gnad la dbab// rtsol bral skye med rtogs pa'i don// rtog bral dngos grub thob par nges// gus pas gdams ngag dbang du byas// gus stobs gdam ngag rtsa ba ste// the tshom med pa gdams ngag mchog/ yid ches rtogs pas don la skyob// rtog pas 'bras bu dbang du byas// 'gro drug snang ba rang gi sems// rang sems rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 'khor ba ye nas dag par grol// bde ba chen po ral gri yis// chags [(]9[)]

sdang zhe sdang gnyis snang bsgral// phrag daug tsher ma bcad de bzhag/ byams pa chen po'i bdud rtsi yis// gnyis su med pa'i nad pa sos// 'dod chags drag po gsad de bzhag/ shes rab chen po'i nyi ma yis// gti mug mun pa'i mtho khungs phye// ma rig mun pa gsal bar byed// ye shes chen po'i tho ba yis// nga rgyal chen po sbyin nas bcom// tshogs drug yul gyi gras thag bcad// ces sungs so// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ 'phrin las zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhis bstan pa'i le'u stebadun pa'o//// yang gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa// kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// 'phrin las la sbyar ba'i phyir// 'gro don la sogs bcas pa cig/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// gar gyi dbang mo nyon cig/ dang po maN+Dal byi dor bya// sngon 'gro yan lag gzung bar bya// thugs rje chen por bsgom byas la// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hrIH ra la ra la hriHhrIHA I pradz+nyA bo d+hi sa ra sa ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma Ni ma Ni/ hriM hriM swAhA/ 'di ni 'bum phrag lnga bzlas na// zhal mthong phyi ma byang chub thaub// snying po bzlas zhing tsha tsha gdab// shes rab thabs dang mtshon sbyor la// snang ba sku yi rang bzhin gnas// snang ba'i rang bzhin chos sku la// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// sgra dbyangs chen po don dang ldan/ khyad par bsam pa ji bzhin du// sems can rnam la bshad par 'tshal// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hrIH uSh+Ni Sha tra swa ro naM d+harma sid+hi/ badzra sa twa tre lo kya rat+na tra yA ya// pa shi pad+mo u ta pa ne me swa hA/ lha dgod dmigs gtad mchod rten bzhengs// gang dag sems can mthong ba rnams// grol te bde bar gnas pa'o// 'bru bdun 'chang ba'i skyes bu ni// sangs rgyas sa lam bgrod par byed// oM gyi rang lus tshags su gzhug/ oM gyis 'gro don phyogs med du// sgrib sbyangs nyi bsgrubs sid+d+hi blang// gang la gang 'dul 'gro don du// sems can mos pa tha dad pas// sangs rgyas mtshan yang so sor btags// theg pa rim dgu don la gcig/ yig bru bcu dgu'i dngos grub blang// chos rnams mjug bsdu dngos grub blang// rdzas sna drug la sngags btab la// me mar chu ni mi zad 'bar// rdzas bzhi'i reng bu'i hoM yang bya// rnal 'byor bsgrub la gnyid che na// rdzas bzhis gnyis bsrungs dud pas bdug/ tad+yathA// badzre badzra ma ma badzre// ma hA bya ti ha na ha na/ badzra pe ne swAhA/ brgya rtsa bzlas pas nad rnams thub/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hrIH oM tsa tra rbad/ duM duM chil chil hUM hUM phaT phaT/ brgya rtsa btab pas kha char chod// oM pad+mo dza du ma le badzra le hUM phaT// brgya rtsa btab pa mig nad sel// oM ni sel dza chod swAhA/ brgya rtsa btab pas mdzes pa chod// oM pa khri swAhA/ brgya rtsa btab

pas dug nad sel// oM a la le/ bi la le/ badzra rtsa le/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba ma hA ban d+ha swa hA/ brgya rtsa bzlas pas 'jigs pa thub/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hrIH oM ha ra ha ra/ shu tra d+ha ni si ta ra ye swA hA/ bsngags mdud bor bas 'dre gdon thub// bsngags btab rdzas rnams byugs pas dgra rkun thub// oM sarba ga ri sarba sid+d+hi dza b+ha la d+ha ye swAhA/ byin rlabs spyan drangs dag pa spel// mgron bzhis thams cad tshim par bsam// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hrIH me long g.ya' dag ngos la bri// rgyal mtshan rtse 'am lus la bcang// 'od phog sems can grol bar 'gyur// mtha' yod me long nang du bri// oM pad+mosh+Ni Sha d+harma si sha d+harma pa la ru pa la/ oM mi d+ha ra bud+d+ha ya dge/ a nu d+ha ra ya/ lang ga d+he ya/ d+harma d+he ya/ mi de pa la a a/ mtha' la thugs pas 'khor bar 'khor// sangs rgyas mtha' med zang thal chos dbyings so// khams gsum 'khor ba'i mthar thug ni// nyon mong lnga la gzhi blangs nas// 'gro ba drug tu 'khor 'das med// 'khor ba 'das nas skye med dbyings// rtag tu sdug bsngal mtha' dag bral// chos nyid chen po'i ngang la gnas// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ 'gro don las tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// yang gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ dbang po tha ma'i lam khyer dang// dbang po 'bring gi lam khyer dang// dbang po rab kyi lam khyer gsum// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// gar gyi dbang mo nyon cig/ dal 'byor rnyed dka' rgyu 'bras las la 'dzem// myur du 'chi ba rtag cig dad pa bskyaid// phyi yi mi khom gsum la bzod glag med// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song la// tsha grang bkres skom bkol spyad bzod pa med// nang gi mi khom gsum la bsran du med// mtha' khob kla klo dbang po ma tshang ba// tshe rings lta log rigs chad bsran glags med// nyams dga'i yul skyes dbang thang chai// nyan bshad bsgom dang dbang po tshang// dad ldan byed pa rnam smin shes// nam 'chi cha med mi rtag grogs su brten// 'dus byas mi rtag sngar gyi mi rnams zad// lo zla bzlas shing shi dang nye// rang nyid gcig pur nyal te 'dug/ nor rdzas bu tsha 'khor g.yog kun dang bral// 'chi ba slur med sd-ig phyogs nor mi bsag/ skar ma rab rib mar me dang// sgyu ma zil pa'i chu pur dang// rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu// srog gcod ma byin len pa dang// mi tshangs spyod dang brdzun du smra// phra ma ngag 'khyal tshig rtsub dang// gnod sems brnab sems log par lta// mi dge bcu spyod ngan song gsum du skye// mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga// lci bzhi log brgyad kha na ma tho gsum// 'di

gsum spyod pas ngan song gsum du ltung// de bas rgyu 'bras chos la zhen pa bzlog/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed tshad med bsgom// pha rol phyin drug lnga yi sgo nas 'jug/ sku gsum lam khyer snying po bzlas// zhes pas/ 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ dbang po tha ma la gdams pa'i lam khyer bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang// bla ma slob ma gdams ngag dang// legs par brtag cing yid ches bya// dgon pa rten la 'du 'dzi spang// byang chub bsgrub la brtson par bya// phyin ci ma log yang dag don// yang dag smra bsam brjod las 'das// zhi gnas lhag mthong gsal stong nyams// sgo gsum ma bcos thogs med ser bu lta// zhen med bu chung g.yu rdo ltar ram lha mchod lta/ gzung 'dzin chags zhen med par spyod// bcos med lhug par lam khyer bya// zhes pas/ 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ dbang po 'bring gi lam khyer bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu po//// mkha' la nyi shar rang byung rig pa'i rtsal// rang gsal chu dang 'o ma'i tshul// 'bras bu thig le gcig tu dbyer mi phyed// rang la gnas kyang bsgribs te ngo ma shes// dper na dmus long mig phye bzhin// phyi gzung yul gyis bsgribs te ngo ma shes// me long gsal ba'i bzhin lta bu// yid las bsgribs pas ngo ma shes// rin chen 'dam nas thon pa lta// ma rig mun sel gdams ngag mchog/ gnyug ma glang po shel lta bu/ drang po bcos bsgyur med pas zang thal 'dug/ phyi ris dang shes pa las su rung// 'bras bu gzhan la re ba med// dmyal bar ltung med rig pa yi// cho 'phrul ci yang 'char ba ste// mthongs phye shes pa rnal du phob// spyod yul gang la'ang zhen 'dod med// zang thal lus yod snyam pa med// gnyis med rang grol chen po'i ngang// nam mkha' sprin dang 'ja' tshon dang// chos nyid rol pas ma 'gags 'byung/ dbang du ma gyur rang sar grol// 'bras bu thob zin btsal mi dgos// rig pa rang sar g.yo 'gul med// zab cing rig la ming mi thogs// rjes med mkha' la 'phur ba ltar// yid ches zhen log 'dzin pa bral// chu la gri btab gras thag chod// rgyang mig bltas dang khang stong nyal// chu bzhag dbyer med 'bras bu thig le gcig/ mnyam nyid rgyud la khong khro med// sgo gsum spyod pa lhug par 'char// mi gnas 'khor ba'i chos la zhen pa bzlog/ skyon gyis mi gos sgo gsum rjes med 'char// sems bzung bung ba me tog bcud 'thungs pa// bu chung 'dzug khrid khyung phrug sgong nas 'thon// gser gling rdo med gnyen po rten mi dgos// rgyud yod ngo shes spros pa the tshom chod// ral gri kham mangs kun bcad cig shes

grol// mi rtog gsal ba chu bo'i zhung bzhin nyams su blang// nam mkha' sa me rlung chu lnga// 'dod yon lnga la rol mnyam longs spyod shes// phyogs med rang grol 'phel 'grib med// lhun 'grub 'bras bu phyag rgya che// oM ni lta ba mtha' dang bral// ma ni sgom par gsal 'grib med// Ni ni snang ba skyon mi lta/ pad ni spyod pa blang dor med// me ni mi mthun phyogs dang bral// hUM ni 'bras bu rang la gnas// hriHni gsal la mi rtog yon tan ldan// skyon bral tshang pa'i gsung dang ldan// zhes gsung so// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ dbang po rab kyi lam khyer bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// yang gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ yar lta ba la mi 'byams pa'i// bar 'jin rten tha ma la du mi ltas pa// tha mal rgyu 'bras la mi zag pa cig bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ gar gyi dbang mo nyon cig/ ston pa bla med sangs rgyas rin po che// skyob pa bla med dam chos rin po che// 'dren pa bla med dge 'dun rin po che// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// rang sems stong pa chos kyi sku// don dam thugs rje chen po rtogs gyur na// thugs rje chen po logs na med de/ snying rje'i sems ni kun la bskyed// smon pa'i sems ni kun rdzob la// 'jug pa sems ni don dam la// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// sems kyi ngo bo cir yang ma grub stong par 'dug/ snying rje sems can kun la bu bzhin brtse// byams pa bu gcig phas mthong ltar du gzhan gces kyang// dga' bas pha ma bu tsha skyo dub med// btang snyoms kun la byams pas mnyam pa ris med dang// dper na rtsig pa'i 'gram legs khang ba tshad 'byongs ltar// cho ga dag pas sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i sa lam bgrod// ces pas/ 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ yar lta ba la 'byams su mi bzhugs par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// chud zos gsum du mi gtong bar// srog gcod ma byin len dang mi tshang spyod// mi dge spang zhing lha sku bsgaum// tshig rtsub ngag 'khyal dbyes brdzun phra ma la sogs pa// spang zhing 'bru bdun bzlas shing 'gro drug skye sgo gcad// nga yi lus la 'od byung ba// 'od 'od yi dam lha yi 'od// phyi nang rnam rtog spyang pa'i phyir// yi dam lha dang 'bral mi bya// 'gro drug snang ba rang gi sems// sems las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// rang sems sangs rgyas yin par bshad// brnab sems gnod sems laug lta dang// mi dran dgu dran spang zhing chos nyid stong pa'i ngang la gzhag khyer so rnam gsum dbyer med pa// ma bcos ma bslad

gsal stong ngang la bzhag/ sku mdog phyag mtshan sna tshogs kyang// brda tsam thabs kyis bstan pa las// sems nyid phyi nang med pa la// gzugs dang rdzas su grub pa med// gsal stong 'dug pa de kho na'o// yang dag don gyi thugs rje chen po'o// zhes pas// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ par 'jig rten bya ba la yengs su mi gzhug par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// phyi nang med pa sems su 'dus// snang ba'i phyir 'breng ba'i mkhan po lta// sems las 'khrul pa gzhan na med// ma mthong ma shes lta ba'o// ma bsgaums rang gsal sgom pa'i mchog/ mi rtog mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// gnyen po ma bcos rang shugs la// 'dzin med shes pa rang grol bzhag/ bying na gsal gdab rgod na glod// mi spro mi bsdu shes pa rang sor bzhag/ 'bad rtsol bya rgyu med pas rtsol bsgrub dka' thub bral// bya btsal thams cad mtshan mar ngos gzung yang dag don la bya rgyu med// dad pa gting nas ma skyes kheng grags kyis// sbyin pa btang bas don med ci zhig phan// bsngo ba log pa yi dgas gnas su skye// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas la// dge sdig rang bzhin stong pa'i ngang du grub// sngar rjes bshags shing phyis kyi dam bcas blang// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin re mos pha ma bu tsha 'dra// nor rdzas 'dzin chags zhen pa la/ 'dzin chags mkhan po sems yin pas// chags zhen mkhan po de la lta// sems nyid ye stong dri ma med pas sbyang// stong gsal ye nas yod pas chub// tshogs bsags sgrib pa sbyang mi dgos// sangs rgyas log na bsgrub tu med// ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la// rang sems rtogs pa sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas gzhan la re ba med// ye nas lha sku'i rang bzhin la// de la dbang bskur bya mi dgos// rig pa'i rgyal po sems la dbang// ting 'dzin sems la dbang bskur na// kun la dbang gyur dbang gi mchog/ rang sems dag pa'i dam tshig la// g.yo sgyu rang gis ma khrel bar// lus ngag yid gsum nyams sgrib dag/ nyams sgrib mi gtsang sems kyi ngan rtog yin// rang sems rtog med chos sku la// ye dag ye stong ye sangs chen po ste// mi gtsang nyams sgrib gang yang med cing grol// snang stong sku yi rang gzhin la/ snang tshad thugs rje chen po'i sku// grag stong gsung gi rang zhin las// nye bar bsgrub pa yig 'bru hriH thun mong 'bru drug 'gro drug skye sgo gcod// sems kyi dam tshig rang gis bsrung/ hrIH'di thugs kyi sa bon te// chos kun ma nor byang chub sems su gcig/ snying po ma nor don gyi yig 'bru hriH/ mngon shes rdzul 'phrul stobs dang lung ston sems las byung// thig le gcig la rdzogs pas bsgrub tu med// bde

gsal ma 'gags 'dzin pa'i blo dang bral// mthar thug 'bras bu'i bsgrub pa'o// 'di ni dong sprugs rang bzhin la/ chos sku gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis kar gdags bya bral// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// rang sems rtogs na dong sprugs rin chen dkyil// phyogs su lhung med lhun gyis grub// rgyu yis nam mkha' 'dra ste bskyed pa med// rgyu las ma mchis skye ba med// 'dus ma byas kyi sems nyid la// ye shes nyi ma'i zer 'dra ba// bkag pas mi khegs rang shar yin// gsal byed rig pa 'od dang gsum/ chos nyid dbyings kyi cha la zer/ nam mkha' rlung 'od rig dran bzhi// ma nges po na so so 'char/ zhes pas/ 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ mar las rgyu 'bras la zag su mi gzhug par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// yang gar gyi dbang mos zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ lta sgom spyod gsum 'bras bu'i don cig/ bdag cag rnam la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ gar gyi dbang mo nyon cig/ lta sgom spyo 'bras 'dra lugs bstan// dang po lus gnad dbug sa bcos sems bzhag/ sems kyi gsung thabs zas tshad bstan// lus gnad rnam snang chos bdun ldan// bde la bsten nas mi rtog te// skyes dgu thams mal chos yin no// dran med yid la byar med bzhag/ kun rdzob ngo bo bden par gzungs// bden gzung thamasacad 'khrul pa yin// stong pa'i rig pa gya gyu chai// stong pa'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab// 'byung ba lnga po bstan pa yang// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor bstan/ dbugs la ldang 'jug gnyis yod de// ldang ni dro ba'i rang bzhin no// 'jug ni drang ba'i rang bzhin no// dbugs ni dgang dang bcad dang rngub dang dbyung/ 'khor lo me long sems gtad bzung/ lus 'dar g.yang sa shes pa 'dar// rjes dran gsum gyi 'jug par bya// bgo ba zas sgom tshod zin bya// bcu gsum tshig gis dmar thag bcad// skye tsam nyid na skye ba med// mthong ba'i yul med de las thong// shes sa thog babs gcod pa med// yul du ma byas rig pas khyab// phyi gsal nang gsal 'od po chai// phyi stong nang stong rgya bo che// phyi rig nang rig khong shar gces// gcig shes kun rtags 'khor 'das shes// sems kyi sgo phyed phyi nang snod bcud gsal/ khyab brdal chen po stong par chub// thig ni dang por gnas pa'o// le ni 'gyur ba med pa'o// bsam bya mi bsam par yang bsam mi bya/ bsam du med do dong sprugs chos// rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// rtogs na sangs rgyas yin no cog/ dbyings dang ye shes ngos zin pa'i// snang ba'i dngos po ci 'gyur kyang// yid la mi byed 'dzin pa'i

dri ma dag/ thams cad rang shar yin pa'i phyir// phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i gdeng// blta bya lta byed gnyis med par// rig pa ngo bor ma grub pas// rig pa rang chod 'bral med gsal// bde ba che la gzhan med yin// sangs rgyas sems las gzhan na med// ma byas mi 'gyur byed pa'i rang bzhin pas// 'khor ba'i thog mtha' bcad cing ye shes ngos bzung ste// gom pa mthu bskyed mthun rkyen 'dzom// bag chags tshad zung bar do sel// kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga chos// dbyings kyi rgyan du rol pa'o// brtul zhugs spyod pas chags sdang gcod// rig pa'i spyod pas bde ba bskyed// gsang ba'i spyod pas drod rtags 'byung// smyon pa'i spyod pas zhen pa bzlog/ phyogs mtshams rnam rgyal bcings grol med// gzhi la bsam zhing bsgom du med// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni// ma btsal gzhag na bsgom pa yin// lus la 'dzin med lam du bya// zag med ngos gzung bral ba'o// seng ge glang po spre'u dang// bu chung smyon pa mkha' 'gro bzhin// spyod pa lam du bya// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud las/ lta sgom spyod 'bras kyi grol lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// slob dpon pad+ma'i bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa rdzogs so//// thugs rje chen po 'khor ba dong sprugs kyi rgyud yang dag pa don gyi gdams ngag bcas pa 'di/ mkha' 'gro mtsho rgyal la gdams pa rdzogs so// gshin rje dmar nag gnyis la gtad de rgya/ gu ya/ gterargya/ sbas rgya/ so phag shi kha tham/ a+thi+-i/ ye shes khyung grags zhus so//// rgya gar skad du/ b+kab+katab+ta/ p+dad Ta/ p+dan/ bod skad du// thugs rje chen po pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bde ba can gyi zhing khams pad+ma dbang gi gzhal yas na/ sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la/ yum gos dkar mo dang/ gI ti ma dang/ A lo ke dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang/ tshe dpag med dang/ 'od dpag med la sogs pa rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mkha' 'gro dbang mos/ sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi 'gro ba la ji tsam cig gzigs zhes zhus pas/ sangs rgyas kyis 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ngas yangs par nam mkhas khyab tshad la gzigs/ dog sar 'gro drug kun la gzigs/ khyad par rigs drug nang nas mi la gzigs so// zhes gsungs so// yang zhus pa/ thugs rje'i rang bzhin ji ltar gzigs shing 'byung/ ngo bo ltar gzigs shing 'byung// zhes zhus pas/ yang

gsungs pa/ thugs rje'i rang bzhin mkha' ltar khyab// ngo bo nyi ma ltar 'byung ste// nga'i sku yi sprul pa spyan ras gzigs// gsung gi sprul pa mkha' 'gro gsang ba ye shes/ thugs rje'i sprul pa dpal rta mgrin yon tan gyi sprul pa pad+ma 'byung gnas/ 'phrin las kyi sprul pa rang byung mched bzhi'o// bye brag ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa/ sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o// thugs rje chen po pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang 'khor rnams kyis sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la zhus pa/ rang byung rig pa'i ngo bo ji ltar lags zhus pas/ chos sku snang ba mtha' yas kyis bka' stsal pa// ngo bo chos sku 'gyur med de/ ma bcos ma bslad lhun gyi grub// ma bcos pa ni chos kyi sku// ma bslad pa ni bde ba che// lhun grub chos nyid rnam par dag/ dug lnga ye shes ngo bor rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// yang rig pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas// ngo bo stong pa chos sku la// snang ba rang bzhin med par shar// rgyu 'bras dkar nag rang bzhin kun// dngos po 'dzin med stong par 'jug/ dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par dag/ stong las gsal ba dag tu shar// stong nyid snying rje'i rang bzhin shar// dper na nam mkha' la sprin bzhin du// ma 'gags rang bzhin ngang la 'byung// rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma grub pas// dbyibs dang kha dog bzung ba med// stong la 'dzin med gsal bar 'phro// rtags pas ngos gzung grub pa med// ngo bo stong la rang bzhin gsal// nges tshig brjod pa'i mtha' dang bral// sna tshogs gsal la gcig tu 'dus// bye brag dbye ba'i mtha' las 'das// zhes pa pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ rang byung rig pa'i 'dug tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// yang 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/ rang byung gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di// rtogs par bya ba ji ltar bgyi// sangs rgyas chaus skus yang gsung pa// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid 'di// ma bcos rang thang che por bzhag/ rnam rtog 'thor ba bsdu zhing lta// dper na nam mkha' sprin dang dra// nam mkha' sprin bral ngo bo bzhin// ma bcos pa la chag chad bzhag/ yang na nam mkha'i sprin tshogs bzhin// skye 'gag mkha' las grub par shes// de bzhin brgya khri spang rtogs rnams// 'thor ba bsdu zhing sems la lta// thams cad ma grub sems su lta// sems nyid ma 'gags rang gsal la// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtha' dang bral// dper na rgya mtsho'i skar tshogs ltar// snang la rang bzhin med par brtag/ sems nyid ye nas gsal ba la// gsal la 'dzin pa ma zhugs pa// bu chung mar me'i

dper bzhag 'dra// snang la ngos gzung ma grub pa// dper na chu nang zla ba 'dra// stong la gsal cha ma 'gags pa// dper na bar snang 'ja' tshon 'dra// rgyu 'bras rten 'brel zung 'jug gi/ rgyu nyid sgyu lus phung po las// 'bras bu dbyer med stong par shar// stong pa'irgyu las thugs rjer shar// 'bras bu dbyer med sprul pa'i sku// gzi ldan nyi ma snying po bzhin// rtsol med shugs las byung ba'o// pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// yang 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de nyid rtogs par ma gyur na// ngos ni 'dzin thabs ji ltar bgyi// zhes zhus pas/ sangs rgyas chos skus bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun// sems nyid ma rtogs bdud du che// bdud ngos rang gis zin par bya// chos rnams mnyam pa ris med la// blo ngan skur 'debs chos kyi bdud// mi dang 'du shes spang bar bya/ khams gsum sems can thams cad la// snying rje mnyam pa ris med la// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i bdud// sdug bsngal blo yis mi bzung bar// byas pa'i mkhan po rang ngo rtag/ nyon mongs thod rgal mi btang bar/ ma spangs rang gsal yal du gzhug/ lta ba phyogs ris 'dzin pa'i bdud// phyogs 'dzin rtogs pa'i mtha' dang bral// sgom pa sems 'dzin ba blo la bsgaum// rig pa gsal stong ngang la zhog/ spyod pa dgag bsgrub tshul 'chos bdud// chos brgyad g.yeng ba'i mgo bsnyoms thong// 'bras bu re dogs the tshom bdud// rang sems sangs rgyas rtogs par gyis// dka' thub phyi shol 'dod pa'i bdud// lteb bskyang med par nyams su long// nyams myong bsgom la chags pa'i bdud// sems nyid gang la'ang rten med bzhag/ le lo med par nyams su blang// rang nyid byin rlabs ngo bo la// the tshom zhugs pas byin rlabs bdud// don dam the tshom med par bsgrub// yid ma ches pa bla ma'i bdud// mos gus drag pos gsol ba gdab// dad pa yar grus chos kyi bdud// sdug bsngal byed la lcags kyi brab// 'dus byas tha mar shor bas dge sbyor bdud// skyo bas nyams len srang du gzhug/ sbyin pa chud zos ser sna'i bdud// 'bras bu longs spyod thob re ba// dmigs pa med pa rgya yis thob// tshul khrims chud zos tshul 'chos bdud// sgyu med rang sems dag par bsrung// bzod pa chud zos khong khro'i bdud// gza' gtad med par don la khol// brtson 'grus chud zos longs spyod bdud// mi rtag 'chi bsam chos nyid sgom// bsam gtan chud zos g.yengs pa'i bdud/ yengs med chos nyid klong du klod// shais rab chud zos rang ngo ma shes bdud// sems nyid rig

pa chos skur rtogs// tshe gcig skyes pa'i lus di la/ mdo don chos la dril bar bya// pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ bdud ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// yang zhus pa// bdud dang 'brel pa ji tsam na chod// ces zhus pas// gsung gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// nyams su len pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sems dang bag chags ma bral bar// 'khor 'das dbye yi mi phyed pas// sems nyid ye stong rtogs par bya// 'khor ba chos nyid skye med du// ma rtogs par du mi go bas// 'khor ba rang bzhin med par rtogs// gnyis snang rtog pa ma grol bar// bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin mi 'dzad pa// gnyis snang rang gsal grol du gzhug/ tshogs drug rang grol ma shes par// sems dzin bsgom pas mi chod pas// snang stong ngang du grol du zhug/ 'khor ba skyo ba ma skyes par// mi chos snang ba mi spongs pas// 'dus byas rgyu 'bras don la brtag/ chos nyid bden pa ma mthong bar// 'jig rten chos brgyad mi 'bral bas// chos nyid don la rtse gcig sbyangs// rang nyid gcig tu ma shes par// 'khor 'das blo yis mi 'phreng bas// don med thig le gcig tu bsgom// thamasacad don med ma shes par/ kheng grags dgos med mi shes pas// kun kyang 'brel med blo thag bcad// chos kyi mthar thug blo las 'das// ming tshig don la ma zad par// tshig dang yi ge mi mdzad pas// tshig la mi lta don la brtag/ chos rnams zad par ma skyol bar// gza' gtad med par mi go bas// byar med blo 'das go bar gyis// pad ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ 'brel thag bcad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// yang dbang mo la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis zhus pa// kye sangs rgyas gsung gi bdag/ snang ba stong pa zung 'jug 'di// lta ba'i rang bzhin ji ltar lta// sgom pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar bsgom// spyod pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar spyod// ces zhus pas// gsung gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// sna tshogs yul gyi snang ba la// rnam rtog blo yi dran rig gnyis// gsal stong dbyer med zung du 'jug/ snang stong 'dzin pa ma zhugs par// phyogs 'dzin med pa'i ngang la lta// ma skyes ma 'gags rang so la// gsal 'grib med pa'i ngang la bsgom// ye nas gsal stong dgag bsgrub med// blang dor med pa'i ngang la spyod// dbang po ma 'gag gsal bar lta// ched du mi 'dzin stong par lta// ma 'dres yongs su gsal bar bsgom// gsal la mi rtog goms par bsgom// spyod pa 'di la bya med par// gza' gtad dgag bsgrub med par spyad// pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ lta sgaum spyod pa nyams su blang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ de la rog pa ji ltar 'byung// zhes zhus

pas// gsung gi bdag pos yang gsungs pa/ gsal bas btang snyoms ma rig dag/ ma rtog blo yi 'khrul pa chad/ bde bas sems kyi zug rngu zhi// gsal dang mi rtog bde ba gsum// chos nyid yang don cig rig/ sems kyi ngo bo stong gsal mthong// gsal ba'i mthar thug spros pa med// sems nyid rnam rtog mtha' dang bral// mi rtag mthar thug gzung 'dzin med// sems la dran byed zug rngu med// bde ba'i mthar thug re dogs bral// gsal bas chad pa ma gol ba// mi rtog rtag par ma gol ba// bde bas gnyis 'dzin ma gol bas// dbye ba phyogs su ltung ba med// de ma rtogs pa'i gol ba ni// gsal la zhen pas gzugs khams gol// mi rtog zhen pas gzugs med gol// bde la zhen na 'dod khams gol// dbyer med pa la zhen gyur na// bsam gtan lha ru shugs kyis gol// gsal bar nyams su myong ba na// ma chags ma zhen sprul sku thob// mi rtog nyams su myong gyur na// chags zhen med pas chos sku thob// bde ba nyams su myong gyur nas// zhen chags med pas long sku thob// kun la mi rtog rang ngo shes// ngo bo nyid kyi sku yang thob// gang la zhen chags g.yos med pas// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku yang thob// pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyu da las/ rtogs lugs gol ba gsal ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// yang dbang mo la sogs 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/ kye sangs rgyas gsung gi bdag/ phyi nang rig pa'i ngo sprod ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas// gsung gi bdag pos yang gsungs so// phyi nang yul la ngo sprod pa// ye nas dag pa'i zhing khams la// ma bcos mi bslad ma byas par// lhun gyis grub par rtogs par bya// 'gro ba'i don byed gsal dus su// tshad med bzhi las bskyed pa'i lha// byams pa wa ti kun la dad// rnying rje 'ja' ma li yis rtse// 'bu khang dga' bas don byas pa// btang snyoms lo gi shwa ra skyong// rang byung thugs rje chen po bzhi// dang po bskyed pa'i rgyu med pas// bar du gnas pa'i rten med pas// tha ma rkyen gyis 'jig pa med// lta sgom byed pa'i mkhan po lta// rang gi sems kyis byas pa'i lha// lha de rang gis sems su 'dug/ sems las gang du 'ang ma grub pas// stong pa spros bral lhun gyis grub// rig cing gsal la ngos gzung med// ngo bo stong la rang bzhin gsal// rgya ma chad de mthar ma red// dbyibs dang kha dog brtag tu med// phyi nang ngo bo stong pa la// nang gi rang bzhin gsal ba las// dbyer med stong gsal 'dzin pa bral// ngo bo 'gyur med stong pa de// rig pa skye med chos kyi sku// rig pa 'gag med longs spyod rdzogs// sna tshogs ma 'gag sprul skur shar// pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ phyi nang rig pa'i ngo sprod

bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// yang dbang mo la sogs 'khor gyi zhus pa// de ltar rtogs pa'i mthar phyin pa ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas// gsung gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// brtags pa sna tshogs rang la snang// rgyu 'bras yul med blo las 'das// stong pa blo 'das byar med la/ ji bzhin pa yi ngang la gnas// stong pa gnas med klod pa'i mchog/ mtha' bral spros pa chod pa dang/ rang gsal 'dzin pa gtor ba dang// don dang bral ba med pa dang/ spang blang 'dzin pa zhig pa dang/ gsal la ngos bzung med pa dang/ stong la gsal cha ma 'gags dang// gsal la rtog pa med pa dang// snang la rang bzhin med pa la// rtogs pa'i btsan sa mthar phyin pa'o// yang gsung gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// sems nyid dmigs pa'i mtha' dang bral// bsam pa gza' gtad med par grol// stong pa nyid la thun mtshams med// gza' gtad med la lta rgyu med// dmigs gtad med la bsgom du med// spyad rgyu med la yengs pa med// gzhag rgyu med la btang rgyu med// brjod rgyu med la nor rgyu med// blo ngos gnyis la bzang ngan med// yid kyi yul la phyi nang med// ngo bo stong pas pho mo med// chos la gza' gtad med pa yi// 'bras bu re ba'i mkhan po med// 'dod pa med pas thob pa med// rtsol med 'phrin las btsal du med// ces pas pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las/ rtogs pa mthar phyin bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// yang dbang mo la sogs 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa// de'i yon tan gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas// yang gsung gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa// rgyu 'bras stong par zhugs pa las// 'bras bu stong nyid rgyu 'bras 'char// rtsol med 'gro don byed pa la// 'khor ba gnas kyang skyon ma gos// skyo dub med par 'gro don mdzad// byang chub sems kyi dbang du sdud// 'gro ba'i kha lo thabs kyis sgyur// sems can blo la gar phan bshad// brjed rdo bka' rgyud shul du 'jog/ 'gro ba'i sems nyid lam du 'dzud// sems can rnam rtog rang sar grol// byar med dge sbyor blo la sbyor// rtsol med rang lus rgyu la sbyor// tha ma rtag pa kha lo sgyur// blo sna'i 'khrid thabs sna tshogs ston// rtsa bral nang du go ba ston// don go nyag gcig sems su ston// stong pa skye med chos skur ston// dag snang 'gag med longs sku ston// sna tshogs thabs 'dren 'gro ba 'dul// nyon mongs sems can bde bar grol// zhes pas pad+ma rgyas pa'i rgyud las// mthar phyin pa'i 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so//// rang byung thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas/ mkha' 'gro gar gyi dbang mo/ slob dpon pad ma 'byung

gnas/ jo bo rang byung mched bzhi// mkha' 'gro ma cig mtsho rgyal/ mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan/ rim pa nas rim par brgyud pa'o// smon lam btab cing gter du gtad de rgya// lha mgon gnyis la gtad do srung// klu mgon bdud mgon gnyis la gtad do rgya/ kha tham/ a tham/ rgya rgya//// oD+yan skad du/ ma hA ka rU tsi t+ya b+he ru dz+nyA na pra dz+nyA sa gu h+ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ thugs rje chen po thams cad kyi yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsang rgyud ces bya ba// thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs chos kyi dbang phyug 'jig rten 'dren pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ nub bde ba can gyi zhing khams su// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba tha' yas 'od dpag tu med pa'i klong na/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ sku'i 'od zer sna lnga las thugs rje chen po rigs lnga sprul/ gsung gi 'od zer drug las thub pa chen po drug tu sprul/ thugs kyi 'od zer dpag tu med pa las thugs rje chen po spyan ras zigs yab yum sras bcas 'khor sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa sprul te 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor du bkod do// yang spyi gtsug nas rigs mi 'gyur ba'i thugs rje chen po dmar po phyung nas 'jig rten 'dren par dbang bskur ro/ mgrin pa nas pad+ma 'byung gnas sprul nas pad+ma'i rigs 'dzin du dbang bskur ro// thugs kha nas dpal rta mchog sprul nas snang srid thams cad dbang du bsdus so// shangs rtse nas rdo rje chos sprul nas zhu ba por bzhag go/ lte ba nas yum gos dkar mo gar gyi dbang mo sprul nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi 'khor ji snyed bdus nas/ kun kyang 'dod yon lnga'i longs spyod chos nyid la chos nyid thim par rol cing/ sprul pa dang yang sprul gsum sprul du mas nam mkha' khyab par yang mdzad de 'gro ba sgrol ba la brtson bar 'khod do// de'i tshe rdo rje chos la sogs pa pad+ma'i rigs mgrin gcig tu bsdebs nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye kye/ mgon po bcom ldan thugs rje'i bdag/ chos kyi dbang phyug bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro kun thugs rjes drang ba'i phyir// snying po'i rgyu don bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so rdo rje chos// pad+ma'i rig 'dus 'khor rnams nyon// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'i gtso// thugs rje bstan pa'i rgyud don bshad// sngon 'gro bzhi la dngos gzhi lam/ mthar thug la bzla 'jug sgo dbang// 'gro 'dul las tshogs gnyer gtad lung// shes rab mi ldan rnams kyis zung// zhes bka' stsal to// thugs rje chen po thams cad kyi

yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsang rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi gsol ba// kye ho ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud don bsgrub pa'i sngon 'gro gang// 'gro kun ngan song gnas bsgrub phyir// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig ces gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs dus sprul pa'i 'khor// rgyud don bsgrub pa sngon 'gro yi// chos la bdun te skyabs 'gro dang// sems bskyed tshad med bzhi bsgom zhing// yan lag bcu yis tshogs chen bsag/ thog mar skyabs su 'gro ba yang// yul sam dus chog bslab bya ste// skyabs yul dkon mchog rtsa ba gsum// bsam pas 'gro kun byang chub phyir// dus 'tshams bla med ma thob bar// cho ga mtshan brjod skyabs 'gro zhing// bslab phya yul la re ltos bca'// de nas sems bskyed rim pa yang// smon 'jug don dam bslab bya ste// smaun pas 'gro kun bsgral slad du/ 'jug pa sgo gsum bsgrub la 'bad// don dam dmigs med spros bral bsgom// bslab pa gzhan gces 'gro don spyad// de nas tshad med bsgom pa yang// snying rje byams dga' btang snyoms te// snying rje tshad med kun la snyoms// byams pa tshad med skyob blo btan// dga' ba tshad med gzhan don spros// gtang snyoms tshad med phyogs ris med// de nas tshog bsags rim pa yang// dkon mchog rtsa ba gsum spyan drang// gdan bsham phyag btsal mchod tshogs dbul// sdig bshag yi rang chos 'khor bskul// gsol 'debs bsngo ba smon lam gdab// 'di rnams bsgrub pa'i sngon 'gro te// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi yin no// zhes bka' stsal to// thugs rje chen po thamasacad kyi yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsang rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i sngon 'gro gsang sngags gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'du?s pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/ kye kye ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud don bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi gang// rgyud drug gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs 'dus sprul pa'i 'khor// rgyud don bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi yi// chos la bdun te rten gnas dang// brten pa'i lha bskyed gsang sngags bzlas// ting 'dzin mchod bstod rdzogs rim ste// dang po gnas bskyed rim pa ni// de nyid kun snang rgyu las bskyed// a ye nas ma skyes stong gsal ngang// kun snang byang chub sems sprin las// rang byung rig pa hri dkar gsal// hri las b+h+ruM 'phros gzhal yas khang// lte dbus

pad+ma'i snying po zlum// 'dab drug mu khyud pad stong ldan// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud rdzogs// mnyam yangs 'od kyi khang pa gsal// de na lha bskyed rim pa ni/ sku gsung thugs lha yang sprul te// dal dbus rang rig hri 'od 'bar// rnam smin las bsregs hri de nyid// nyi zla pad steng thugs rje'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// phyag g.yas pad 'phreng thugs kar 'dren// phyag g.yon pad stengs bdud rtsi bum// rat+na'i rgyan rdzogs zhabs skyil krung// rang 'dra'i yum chen gsang yes ma// lus dang bri ma'i tshul du bskyed// 'ja' ris 'od kyi sku yol mdzes// spyi gtsug rigs bdag 'od dpag med// sku dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ni// mnyam bzhag phyag rgya bum pa 'dzin// skyil krung nyi zla pad+ma brdzis// mtshan dpe bzang pos spras par bsam// thugs kar rta mgrin dmar po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dbu gtsug nas// rta mgo ljang ku rta skad 'tsher// phyag g.yas dbang sdud phyag rgya gdengs// phya g.yon zhags pas 'jig rten 'dren// dur khrod chas ldan zhabs gnyis ni// mi ro'i steng na brkyang bskum bzhugs// tsit+ta'i sgau bsrung bar gcod sel// rigs 'dus rang la sprul 'khor kyang// nor 'dzin gsang sngags 'dzin ma sras/ khro bzhi rgyal ba rigs drug dang// thub drug sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis// zhing skyong gro don mdzad par bskyed// de ltar sku gsung thugs lha rnams// gdos bcas rang rgyud ma yin pas// 'ja' 'am chu zla lta bur bsam// oM aHhUM/ oM AHhUM swAhA/ 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs byin brlabs/ 'bru lngas ye shes lngar dbang bskur// de nas gsang sngags bzlas pa ni// tha mal ngag zhen bzlog pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po thams cad kyi// yang snying 'dus pa 'di lta ste// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ oM a hUM hri/ oM ma Ni pad+mehUM phaT/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ phyi ni srog sbas zhi ba'i tshul// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'dzab dbyangs rma bya'i mgrin skad ltar// ngang 'jam zos dal khugs par bzlas// nang ltar zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// yi ge bcu gcig bdud bzhi 'joms/ 'dzab dbyangs ser 'brug ldir ba ltar// 'ur chen mtha' ru grag par bzlas// gsang ba yang snying srog mtha' can// bde gshegs yang snying yi ge bdun// 'jam dbyangs tshangs pa lha yi gsung// rgyun ring gsal dag mthing bar bzlas// de nas ting 'dzin 'dzab dgongs ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'phro 'du ste// lha gsum thugs khar zla ba'i steng// hri mtha' yig drug gsal bkod de// phyi ni gsang drug dngos grub sdud// de yi 'dzab dgongs ting 'dzin 'di'o// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs kha nas// sngags 'phreng 'od zer dkar por 'phros// bde gsheg kun [(]10[)]

gyi sku la phog/ sku mchog mnyes nas sku'i dngos grub// bdag la 'dus shing 'od zer des/ khams gsum sems can lus sgrib sbyang// sems can lus kun dbang 'dus bsam// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ spyi gtsug mtha' yas thugs kha nas// sngagasa' phreng 'od zer dmar por 'phraus// bde gshegs kun gyi gsung la phog/ gsung mnyes gsung gi dngos grub bsdus/ khams gsum sems can ngag sgrib sbyangs// sems can ngag kun dbang 'dus bsam// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ rta mgrin thugs kha'i sngags 'phreng las// 'od zer mthing ka rab spros bas// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs la phog/ thugs mchod mnyes nas thugs dngos grub// bdag la 'dus shing 'od zer des/ khams gsum sems can yid sgrib byang// sems can kun yid dbang 'dus bsam// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM// nang ni dregs pa tshar gcod 'dul// de yi 'dzab dgongs ting 'dzin 'di'o// bdag nyid lha gsum thugs kha yi/ sngags 'phreng khro chung mtshon thogs shing// zhal nas phaT sgrogs tsha tsha 'khrug/ stong gsum bkang nas log lta'i tshogs// gang dag zhi bas mi 'dul ba'i// bdud dang dgra bgegs brdung tshar bcad// bka' sdaud bran khol byas par bsam// kun kyang tshar chod the tshom med// oM AHhUM hri// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM phaT// gsang ba don gyi bzlas pa yis// nyams rtogs spor ba'i ting 'dzin 'di'o// de ltar sku gsum lha tshogs kyang// bdag nyid thugs rje chen po la// 'dus te rnam pa yongs kyis med// gnyis med don gyi lhar gsal bas// rngub pa'i rlung la oM dang ma// gnas pa'i rlung la Ni dang pad// 'byin pa'i rlungs la me hUM hri// ye nas rang byung rang la rdzogs// de don shes bya rlung gis bzlas// nyams rtogs ye shes 'bar bar 'gyur// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri// skabs su tshangs pa'i mgrin dbyangs kyis// ye shes rig pa'i gsal 'dis gdab// hri// snang ba thugs rje chen po'i sku// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i sems la ltos// snang ba thams cad rang snang yin// ye shes rig pa ngo mtshar che// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ hri sgrar grag thugs rje chen po'i gsung/ tshig dang bral ba'i don la ltos// grag pa thams cad rang grag yin/ ye shes rig pa ngo mtshar che// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ hri rtog tshogs thugs rje chen po'i thugs// ye shes zang thal ngang la zhog/ grol ba thams cad rang grol yin/ ye shes rig pa ngo mtshar che// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ hri rang nyid lha dang gnyis su med// gnyis 'dzin bral ba'i ngang la ltos// lta byed rtog pa rang sar grol// bltas pas thugs rje chen mi mthong// ma bltas bzhag pas lha dang mjal// ma bsgrubs gnas pas sangs rgyas

'grub// grub pa med do cir mi dgongs// rang byung thugs rje chen po yin// rang snang snang ba mtha' yas yin// rang gsal rta mgrin rgyal po yin// rang grol gsang ba ye shes yum// ye nas ma skyes thub pa drug/ rang bzhin brjod med sangs rgyas stong// thabs cad dbyer med chos kyi sku// ma 'gag rang gsal longs spyod rdzogs// sna tshogs 'dzin grol sprul pa'i sku// ye shes rig pa ngo mtshar che// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni// phyi nang gsang ba mchod rdzas bsham// yid sprul mchod sprin kha bkang nas// 'di skad mchod cig bsngo bar gyis/ hri/ kun 'byung nam kha'i klong yangs nas/ bdug spos me tog mar me dri// bshos gtsang sil snyan rol mo dang// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// rang byung rnam dag bdud rtsi dang// 'dzin chags bral ba'i gtor ma dang/ rigs drug bsgral ba'i rak+ta dang/ gnyis med sbyaur ba'i byang chub sems// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin mchod sprin gyi// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// bla ma dkon mchog yi dam lha// bdag nyid chen po'i lha tshogs chod// gnyis med dgyes pas tshim gyur la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// de nas dgyes bstod bya ba ni// hri/ bde gshegs rgyal pa 'dus pa'i sku// thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs// zhal gcig rang byung ye shes sku// phyag gnyis thabs shes 'gro ba 'dul// sku dmar 'khor 'das ye shes dbang// rin chen rgyan 'phreng chos nyid rol// phyag g.yas pad 'phreng 'khor ba 'dren// phyag g.yon bdud rtsi dug lnga 'joms// zhabs gnyis skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// gsang yais yum 'khyud chos dbyings spyor// nyi zla pad gdan dug gsum dag/ 'od lnga'i rgyab yol sku lngar rdzogs// ye nas rang byung thugs rje'i sku// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod// hri dus gsum rgyal ba 'dus pa'i gsung// 'gro ba'i mgon po tshe dpag med// mtha' bral theg le'i zhal gcig mdzes// 'khor 'das mnyam bzhag phyag rgya can// spros bral ye shes bum pa 'dzin// bde gsal mi rtog mnyam pa'i steng// chos sku mi 'gyur skyil krung bzhugs// chos nyid rol pa'i mtshan dpe rdzogs// 'dren pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// hri phyogs bcu sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i thugs// snang srid dbang sdud rta mchog dpal// zang thal zhal gci kun tu zang// rta gdong sa lam dus gcig gcod// 'khor 'das zil gnon rta skad bsgrags// phyag g.yas thabs kyi srid dbang sgyur// phyag g.yon shes rab 'gro kun 'dren// dur khrod chas kyi log lta 'joms// brkyang bskum zhabs gnyis bdud

bzhi 'dul// ro gdan chos sku lhun gyis grub// thugs rje dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod// hri rig 'dus rang la sprul 'khor rnams// 'gro 'dul cha lugs cir yang ston// sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las bdag/ bdud bzh-i 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni/ lha nyid sems su shes bya ste// bsgom bya'i lha sems sgrub byed kyi// mkhan po bdag kyang sems nyid de// lha dang lha min 'byed pa sems// de ltar sems kyi rang bzhin stong// ngo bo mtshan nyid thams cad stong// de yang tha dad ma yin te// snang stong gnyis 'dzin blo las 'das// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// stong gsal spros med chos kyi sku// bde chen thig le gcig tu rdzogs// zhes bka' stsal to// thugs rje chen po thams cad kyi yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi rgyud las// rgyud don bsgrub pa dgos gzhi'i gsangs sngags lam gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ kye ho ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud don grub mtha' la bzla gang// 'khor ba dong nas sprug pa'i phyir// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol ba dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs 'dus sprul pa'i 'khor// rgyud don grub mtha' 'bras bu yi// chos la bdun te lta sgom dang// spyod 'bras dbang dam 'phrin las te// thugs rje chen po'i lta ba ni// snang sems ye nas dbyer med cing// mtha' bral rang grol gza' gtad med// ngang gsal ngos gzung rnam dag yin// thugs rje chen po'i sgom pa ni// mi rtog gsal stong rang byung gi/ ngang la ma bcos dmigs gtad bral// rtog tshogs chos skur rang grol yin// thugs rje chen po'i spyod pa ni// stong dang snying rje dbyer med kyi// nga la rtsol med blang dor bral// ma byas 'gro don lhun grub yin// thugs rje chen po'i 'bras bu ni// re dogs btsal med rang gnas sems// skye 'gag gnyis med chos kyi sku// lhun grub 'gyur med thag chod yin// thugs rje chen po'i dbang don ni// thams cad ye sangs rgyas pa'i dbang// rtogs shing rang dbang rang gis sgyur// bskur thob rtsol bral bde chen yin// thugs rje chen po'i dam tshig tu// rang sems dri med gsal dag gnas// bdag med srung mtshams nyams grib grol// don las 'da' ba med pa yin// thugs rje'i 'phrin las lhun grub ni// gzung 'dzin dug zhi ye shes rgyas// snang srid dbang 'dus 'gro drug bsgral// ma byas don kun lhun grub yin// de ltar chos kun khong chud na/ snang srid gzhi bzhengs 'khor dong sprug/ thugs rje'i mthar thug cir mi dgongs// grub pa

mthar phyin 'khrul pa med// ces bka' stsal to// thugs rje chen po thams cad kyi yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsang rgyud las/ grub mtha' la bzla'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi gsol pa/ kye ho ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud don dbang bskur rim pa gang// skal ldan rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs 'dus sprul ba'i 'khor/ skal ldan rjes gzung dbang bskur gyi// chos la bdud te zhal bsham zhing// phyi nang gsang dbang don ngo sprad/ 'gro 'dul dbang bskur yon tan brjod// thog mar dal bsham chog khrigs ni// man+Da skyang nul thig rdzogs dbus// lte ba'i phyi rol 'dab drug bri// yi ge bdun dgod pad stong bskor// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud ldan// rin chen tshon lngas yid 'ong bri// lte bar rdzas ldan bum pa dgod// gtor chen mchod tshogs rgyan kun dgram/ lha bskyed mchod bstod bsnyain pa dbul// slob bu dal gzhug rjes gnang sbyin// sems bskyed sgo dbye me tog dor/ spyan dbye dal bstan dam tshig bsgrag/ de nas phyi yi dbang bskur te// bdag dang gzhal yas bum pa'i nang// lha bsgom sngags 'phreng spro bsdu bya// bum dbang slob ma'i spyi gtsug tu// 'di skad bsrung zhing khrus nas dbyung// hrI/ bum pa spros bral chos kyi sku// bcud 'di longs spyod yi dam lha// sprul sku'i khrus kyi ma rig 'khrud// lha dbang lus la rdzog gyur cig/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ de rjes nang gi dbang bskur te// bdag lhar gsal bas slob bu la// bskyed rim phog rjes dgug gzhug bstim// yang snying lung dbog bzlas brjod bya/ bdud rtsis ngar blud 'di skad brjod// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa aM// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// rang mdun slob bu thal sbyar langs// snying khar zla stengs hri dmar po// rnam shes mar me lta bu la// sems gzung rigs bdag spy-i bor bsgom// dri dang rol mo'i sbyor ba brtsam// yang snying dbyangs su drag bzlas pas// bde gsal 'dzin med shugs la 'char// 'khor ba myang 'das kun gyi gzhi// rang sems rig na 'ching grol med// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin// sna tshog rang grol rig pa'i dbang// me long bstan la dgongs pa bskyang// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hrI/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de rjes dbang don ngo sprad de/ hri/ sems nyid gsal la 'dzin rtog med// me long lta bur rtogs pa na/ dran rtog chos kyi dbyings su nub// zug ngu bral bas bde ba can// de ni gnas mchog rig pa'i

dbang// sems nyid gsal la 'dzin rtog med// me long lta bur rtogs pa na// sgo gsum tha mal sku gsung thugs// cir mi dgongs pas thugs rje che// de ni lha mchog rig pa'i dbang/ sems nyid gsal la 'dzin rtog med// me long lta bur rtogs pa na// sgo lnga yul dang gnyis med mchod// de ni tshogs chod rig pa'i dbang// sems nyid gsal la 'dzin rtog med// me long lta bur rtogs pa na// 'gro don bya med lhun gyis grub// de ni gzhan don rig pa'i dbang// sems nyid gsal la 'dzin rtog med// me long lta bur rtogs pa na// 'du shes bral bas 'khor ba dag/ de ni dong sprugs rig pa'i dbang/ rgyal pos dbang mchog bskur mi la// 'khor rnams kyi ni cis mi bskur// bum chu spyi nas blugs dus su// lus kun khyab par smos ci dgos// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bar ba'i tshe// gang phrad spyod pa chos nyid de// ye shes 'khor lo me 'bar bas// ma rig nags sreg the tshom med/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri// dz+nyA na a b+hi Shin+tsa hri/ de nas 'gro 'dul dbang bskur te/ 'dab drug steng gi ye ge bdun// skal ldan bu la tshig 'dis gtad// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ oM lha dbang lha brgya byin sku gsung thugs// lha rnams 'dus pa'i srog snying oM/ oM zung lha yi 'gro ba 'dul/ ma/ thag bzangs rig kyi sku gsung thugs// lha min 'dus pa'i srog snying ma/ ma zug lha min 'gro ba thul/ Ni/ shAkya thub pa'i sku gsung thugs// mi rnams 'dus pa'i ro snying Ni// Ni zung mi yi 'gro ba thul/\u0f84 pad/ seng ge rab brtan sku gsung thugs// byol song 'dus pa'i srog snying pad/ pad zung byol song 'gro ba thul/ me/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi sku gsung thugs// yi dgas 'dus pa'i srog snying me// me zung yi dgas 'gro ba 'dul/ hUM/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs// dmyal ba 'dus pa'i srog snying hUM/ hUM zung dmyal ba'i 'gro ba thul/ hri/ thugs rje chen po'i sku gsung thugs// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i srog snying hri/ hri zung 'khor ba dong nas sprugs// zhe brjaud thub pa drug tu bsgom// A+oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri// sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hri// de nas dbang don brjod pa ni// e ma ho/ legs 'ongs bu khyod skal ba bzang// de ltar dbang rdzogs spyan ras gzigs/ khyod yin sangs rgyas sku gsum 'chang// mkha' mnyam 'gro don da spyod cig/ dus gsum bde gshegs sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las ma lus kun/ yig bdun dbang la yang dag rdzogs// dbang thob yon tan mtha' yas te/ rnam kun mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di dag/ til 'brur gsil nas bgrangs na 'dzad// dbang thob yon tan zad mi

shes// 'jig rten sems can srog bton pa'i// bsod nams 'phags pas bgrang nus kyis/ yig bdun lan cig brjod pa yi// yon tan brjod par ga la nus/ khams gsum sems can ma lus kun// sangs rgyas sar bkod yon tan rnams// bgrang bar nus kyis yig bdun pa// gcig brjod yon tan bgrang mi nus// rgyal ba nam mkha' gang ba la// mchod pa phul ba'i bsod nams tshogs/ bgrang bar nus kyi yig bdun pa// gcig brjaud yon tan bgrang mi nus// yi bdun dbang thob 'dzin zlos mi/ las dag las kyi rnam smin rung/ mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga// dus 'di nyid la sbyong bar byed// yang snying yid la su byed tshad// thugs rje chen po de yin phyir// bar chod bgegs zhing 'gro ba 'dul// snang srid 'khor 'das dbang du 'gyur// yang snying mthog thos dran reg rung// bsgom bzlas 'dri 'cham ston pa rnams// yon tan kun ldan gar skyes kyeng// spyan ras gzigs dang 'bral mi srid// ces bka' stsal to// thugs rje chen po thams cad yang snying mthong ba ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsung rgyud las/ skal ldan rjes gzung dbang bskur gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa// kye ho ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyu don 'gro 'dul la sogs gang// thabs kyis 'jig rten drang ba'i phyir// bdag cag 'khor la bka' rtsol cig/ ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs 'dus sprul pa'i 'khor/ 'gro ba 'dul ba las tshogs kyi// chos la bdun te tshogs 'khor dang// bsrung ba tshe bsgrub rten rab gnas// skye bdun sha bsgrub lam rim ste// thog mar bsod nams tshogs 'khor bshad// maN+Dal mchod rdzas dbang dang mtshungs// 'dod yon lngar ldan tshogs 'khor bsham// rang nyid lhar gsal thugs kha nas// raM 'phros dngos 'dzin rnam rtog spang// yaM gis bag chags zhen snang gtor/ khaM gis gnyis 'dzin dri ma bkru// oM spros 'dod lnga'i longs spyod 'phel// AHyis ye shes bdud rtsir rlab// hUM gis bgegs bskrad thugs dam bskang// dbyangs tshig gar gyis rab tshon nas// lha rnams spyan drangs phyag 'tshal mchod// rjes su bdag mchod kun mnyes rol// lhag mas pho nya'i tshogs rnams bskang// gtor btang sri mnan rgyun gcod byed// bsod nams tshogs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs// 'jig rten dge ba kun gyi mchog/ de nas bsrung 'khor btags chog bshad// dar la mtshal gyi 'khor rtsibs drug mu khyud gsung ldan lte dbus su// bsgrub bye'i ming rus rak+Shar spel// gser dngul legs sbyangs lte bar hri// rtsibs la yig drug

de bzhin bri// gsal byed dbyangs yig mu khyud nang/ bar ma rten 'brel phyi ma la// rdo rje me ri mtshon chas bskor// rab tu gnas bya spyi gtsug gdabs// snying gtsug mgrin pa snying kha ru// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dkar dmar mthing// gong bzhin bsam zhing snying po bzlas// yid ni bsrung bya srung byed kyi// 'dzin byed cir mi dgongs par bzhag/ de yis nad gdon dug lnga zhi// bar gcod bgegs kyi ga la tshugs// bsrung ba'i rgyal po btags chog 'di// lus la bcangs bas bya chub nges// de nas 'chi med tshe bsgrub bshad// rang gi spyi gtsug 'od dpag med// bdud rtsi bsnams pa'i bum pa nas// bdag gi sna rlung g.yas dang g.yon// gang nas rgyu de bdud rtsi rngub// snying gang lud pas lus gang bsam// 'og rlung bskum zhing steng rlung mnan// lag pa g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub kyi// rtse chung g.yas g.yon gnyis mnan zhing// thebs bdun nyin re mtshan re bya// thun rjes bla ma rigs 'dzin dang// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// mkha' 'gro ma dang 'gro kun gyi// tshe dpal bsod nams bdud rts-i'i bcud// gtsug gi 'od dpag med la 'dus// 'od dpag med zhu tshangs bu nas// bdag gi lus gang 'chi med bsam// de yis 'chi bslus ltogs pa sel// lus bde sems la rtogs pa 'char// de nas rten gsum bzhengs thabs bshad// 'di yang sku gsung thugs yin te// sku rten bzhi mdo rgya lam du// rgyu ni 'jim ras rin chen la// 'gro mgon thugs rje chen po'i sku// dkyil 'khor zhing khams gtso rkyang rung// ji ltar rkyen dang 'tsham pa bzhengs// yang snying gsum bzhugs rab gnas bya// yul khams kun gyi mnga' phul na// bkra shis thugs rje'i bstan pa rgyas// sku de mthong thos dran reg rung// mchod cing bskor ba
