sus byed tshad// tshe 'dir rkyen bzlog bsam legs 'grub// nag po'i phyogs zhi sku bzhengs mkhan// 'phos thog bde ba can du skye// sku la brten nas 'gro ba yis// tshogs sogs sgrib pa sbyangs thabs so// 'phags pa'i gsung rten bzhengs pa'i thabs// gser zang mthing shog gal spobs la// baiDUr+Ya 'am gser dngul gyis// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hrI/ oM AH hUMHhrI/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM phaT/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ gsal dag mdzes pa brgya stong ngam/ khri 'bum bye ba gang spobs bri// gleg bam bcas te gsung sgrags lugs// gsung mi 'chad dam sil bu ru// rgyun par yul phyogs gar bklags kyang// nag po'i phyogs kyi glags mi rnyed// gsung thos yon tan brjod las 'das// 'on te bzhi mdor khang bu'i nang// dkar zhal zla 'dra'i dbus su hri// mtha' ru yig drug mtshal gyis bri// de 'og 'dzul lam bskor yang

rung// mthong thos yon tan gong bzhin 'byung// gsang ba thugs rten bzhengs pa ni// ma nu'i 'grul srang bzhi mdo ru// mchod rten bang rim bzhi ldan pa'i// bum pa'i ngos bzhir me long bzhi// yig bdun dang bcas brten par bzhugs// yang snying 'dod gsol spel ba yang// gser gyi bris pa brgya rtsa bzhugs// nang du lha tshaugs bzhengs pa 'am// phan yon ldan pa'i gzungs sngags rnams// tsha tsha'i nang zhugs bum par grub// bang rim nang du bdud 'joms dgod// ri rabs logs bzhir 'grul srang dgod// mnga' dbul rab gnas bzang po bya/ 'di nyid mthong bas byang chub 'thob// lan cig mchod bskor phyag byas pas// ngan song dong sprugs bde ba bgrod// thugs rje'i 'phrin las ngo mtshar che// tshogs sogs sgrib sbyong rten mchog yin// de nas rten sum rab gnas shad// dkyil 'khor mchod rdzas dbang dang mtshungs// sku dang glegs bam mchod rten sogs// ring bsrel gzungs sogs nang rdzongs brub// bgegs bskrad gu gul dud pas bdug/ me long bstan la sku khrus gsol// gnas gsum dri yi thig le bzhag/ bdag nyid thugs rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// dkon mchog rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs// spyan drang mchod pa rgyas par bya// 'bru la rten 'brel bum rten la/ rten gang yin pa'i ye shes sems// rang bzhin spyan drangs rten la bstim// sku gsum thugs su byin brlabs te// spyi bor oM dkar AHdmar mgrin// thugs khar hUM mthing bsam pa'i rjes// oM AHhUM/ kA ya waka tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM AHhUM// zhes brjod mkha' mnyam bde gshegs kyis// dbang bum thogs nas rten nyid la// dbang bskur rab gnas byed par bsam// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM oM AHhUM swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ sku rten yi ni spyan dbye te// gser thur sman gyis brgyan pa thogs// spyan dbye'i tshul bstan 'di skad brjod// oM AHhUM dz+nyA na tsak+Shu pra ye sha phaT/ glegs bam la ni zhal bsro te// yi ge thams cad chos de yi// lha tshogs snying po'i 'phro 'dur bsam// rang bzhin bstim zhing 'di brjod bya/ oM AHhUM/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I// e ai/ o au/ aM AH ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ ba pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ sarba d+harma pra be sha tiSh+Tha lhan/ mchod rten la ni mnga' dbul te// yi dam dkyil 'khor bskyed la bstim// stong gsum sprul skus gang bsam te// oM AHhUM hrI/ sarba byid swA hA/ badzra d+harma da d+hu rat+na ka ni ka sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ de ltar rten gsum gang yin kyang/ skabs 'dir gong gi me tog gtor// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te Shany+tsa yo

ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na ye sA hA/ de rjes mchod pa kun gyi mchod// bskor ba bya zhing bkra shis brjod// tshig brda bzang smra yo lang bskyed// yon dbul gtang rag mchod pa bya// 'gro 'dul 'jig rten bde legs 'gyur// de nas skye bdun sha bsgrub bshad// de nyid rtag grub 'gro don bya// rtag pa skye bdun gang yin des// mi yi skye ba bdun po dran// de yang chos ldan skye bdun pa'i// ro blang sha rnams legs bskams te// grub thob gnas chain dge gnas su/ khang gsar dkar gsal gru bzhi'i nang// thugs rje chen po'i dal dbus su// rin chen bum pa chas ldan nang// skye bdun sha ni sran tshad la// bzang drug gla rtsi a mr-i ta// grub thob sha chen rtag tu ngu// sman dang 'bras phye phul gang byar// rgyal rigs bu chung bya rgod sha/ yod par gyur na skyobs su gtong// sbyor thabs des 'dre rdzogs par sbyar// btsun mo gser gyi nu zhos spru// ril bu grangs med ji snyed grub// tshog mchod du mas lha rnams mchod// rnal 'byor lnga yis gzungs thag bzung// ji srid gzungs 'dzin mang na mchog/ thugs rje cher bsgom dmigs pa ni// ril bu re re dag la yang// thugs rje chen po'i skur rdzog sam// yang snying 'di bzlas bsgrub par bya// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ a ra pa tsa mi ta hr-i da ya swA hA/ 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri// mtshan ltas bzang mthong sngags 'di sbrel// oM A hUM swA ha muM laM maM pyaM taM/ sarba ta thA ga ta mahA pany+tsa oM A yu dz+nyA na ma ha puN+yai tiSh+Tha oM/ de la rtags byung dngos grub blang// de nas gzhan don spyod pa'i tshe// gdul bya sbyang phyir khrus kyang bya// zhag bdun kha gso rjes gnang sbyin// rim bu'i bum dbang 'dis bskur ro// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hri a/ ril bu su yi ltor song nas// skye ba gang dang gar skyes tshad// spyan ras gzigs dang 'bral mi srid// bdag bas gzhan gces 'gro ba'i don// thugs rje chen po'i bslab pa srung// rdzas mchog reg mchog ngo mtshar che// de nas lam gyi rim pa bshad// 'di la rnal 'byor nyi shu gcig/ thog mar dbyug chos rnal 'byor ni// smra bshad spa dkar gang yang rung// gcig skyes drangs sra snum zhing 'dril// mnyen lcug ring thung khru gang tshad// lhar bskyed byin brlabs dbang yang bskur// yang snying 'bum bsnyen dbyug pa des// rang la brdabs na las sgr-ib 'dag/ gzhan la brgyab na nad gdon 'byer// dgra dang bgegs la brdabs na brlag/ dbyug pa'i brda don ngo sprad na// gcig skyes thig le nyag gcig ste// drang po chos nyid ma bcos pa/ sra mkhraigs gnyen pos gzhom du med/ snum pa byang sems ngang gi snum// 'dril pas don chen chos kun 'dus// mnyen lcug

'gro don yid bzhin 'byung// tshad dang ldan pas phyogs lhung bral// de phyir don ldan dbyug pa 'di// bde stong dbyer med gsal bsgaums nas// bdag gzhan gang la brdeg gyur kyang// nad gdon nyon mongs bag chags 'joms// rnam rtog las mdzad 'khor dong sprugs// de nas gsol debs rnal 'byor ni// bla ma'i sku gsung thugs nyid la// bdag nyid lus ngag yid dad pas// 'gro kun 'dren pa'i gsol 'debs bya// spyi gtsug bzhugs la dbang bzhi zhu// bar chod kun sel rtogs pa 'char// de rjes bla ma rang la bstim// rang nyid bla ma ma bcos bzhag/ de nas zhi ba'i rnal 'byor bshad// bum pa rdzas ldan khrus chus dgang// 'phags pa'i gzhal yas gsal bkod de// yang snying stong bzlas khrus byas na// nad gdon sdig sgrib zhi bar nges// dri chu bar ba'i khrus byas na// nyams grib skongs nas dngos grub 'thob// sems nyid stong gsal rig pa'i khrus// 'dzin pa'i dri mas ma gos bzhag/ dug lnga rnam rtog zhi bar nges// de nas rgyas pa'i rnal 'byor bshad// pad+ma rin chen rna lnga la// yang snying lnga bri'i gtsug tu bcang// yig bdun lnga 'bum bzlas gyur na// tshe nor bsod nams longs spyod rgyas// de rjes dri chen bskor bzlog bza'// tshe dpal bsod nams rgyas par byed// sems nyid yid bzhin nor bu la// rtogs goms chu bzhin rgyun mi bcad// mi zad gter la longs spyod nges// de nas dbang bdud rnal 'byor bshad// me long sin d+hur yig bdun bris// zhag bdun yang snying bzlas bstim na// me long su dang sus mthong tshad// snang ba dbang 'dus bsgo ba nyan// rang gi srin lag g.yon khrug byung/ yig bdun bum gdab sus zos 'du// de rjes rang rig rang gsal la// 'dzin med goms pas dbang du 'du// snang srid 'khaur 'das dbang 'gyur nges// de nas mngon spyod rnal byor bshad// dgra bgegs ling ga ming rus can// mdun du bzhag la dmigs pas bstim// hri hUM nr-i dza mA ra ya rbad/ bdun 'bum sngags pas rang gshaid 'bebs// de nas khyab 'jug rgyu ba la// dug phur snying khar btab na 'chi// de rjes rang byung ye shes kyi/ ral gris nga bdag 'dzin pa bcad// 'gro drug 'khor rgyun chod par nges// de nas maN+Dal rnal 'byor bshad// rin chen maN+Dal gser g.yus brgyan// yi ge bdun gyi byin brlabs te// 'gro kun byang chub thob bya'i phyir// bla ma sprul pa'i sku la dbul// rang lus maN+Dal dbang pos brgyan// bla ma longs spyod rdzaugs la dbul// chos dby-ings maN+Dal rig pas brgyan// bla ma chos kyi sku la dbul// tshogs gnyis myur rdzogs mchog thob nges// de nas bskor ba'i rnal 'byor

bshad// 'phags pa'i sku gsung thugs rten la// bla ma yi dam bde gshegs 'dus// mos pas yang snying bzlas shing bskor// bya ba kun las bskor ba mchog/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu bla ma bzhugs// 'gro 'dug bskor bar shes par bya// rang sems rig pa ye shes la// goms pa'i bskor ba rgyun mi bcad// 'khor 'das ru shan phyaid par nges// de nas bdun tshig rnal 'byor bshad// tshe 'das ro'am mtshan byang la// yig bdun bkod de bum bar gzung// bdun bar bdun du yig bdun bzlas// mtshan byang bsregs te tsha tsha gdab// dur brgyags tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshams// thugs rje chen po'i lha tshogs bskang// tshe 'das rnam shes rang la bstim// gnyis med mnyam sbyor chen po gnas// gshin des bla med 'bras thob nges// de nas sbyin sreg rnal 'byor bshad// bsreg rdzas 'bru sna sman zas sbyar// me nyid thugs rje chen por bskyed// hri dz+wa la raM kha hi sA hA/ zhai+es dbul thal ba chab la gshegs// bdag nyid thugs rje chen por bsam// gzhan gyi dad rdzas tshogs su rol// bsreg rdzas 'dzin 'khrul rtog pa'i tshogs// rang byung ye shes me yis sbyangs// bar chod kun zhi lha skongs nges// de nas tsha tsha'i rnal 'byor bshad// sa chu me rlung 'byung bzhi la// yang snying bzlas shing skor phor gdab// gzhal yas lhar bcas bstim la mchod// zhing khams rnam dag des 'grub 'gyur// rang lus gzhal yas mchod rten nang// rtog tshog lhar gsal tsha tsha ste// chos dbyings stong pa'i skor phor du// rig pa'i ye shes chod rten bzhugs// mchod rten mchog tu bdag 'gyur nges// de nas zas kyi rnal 'byor bshad// zas tshad bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab// spyi gtsug 'grin pa lte ba'i nang// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro bsam// 'dod yon lnga ldan tshogs la rol// yang na sha lnga bdud rtsir bsam/ bdag nyid chen po'i zhal du rol// rgyun du rngub rlung bdud rtsi ru// bsam nas rol na tshe ring zhing// 'chi med rtog pa 'char bar nges// de nas gtor ma'i rnal 'byor bshad// zan nam chab gtor gang 'byor bshams// yang snying brjod de bdud rtsir brlab// rigs drug dgug cing 'phag par bskyed// 'dod yon lnga yis tshim par bsngo// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar gsal bas// gtor ma dngos grub tshul du rol// bdag 'dzin zhen rtog blos thong la// spros bral kun khyab ngang la zhog/ gtor ma dbyings su mthong bar nges// de nas chab sbyin rnal 'byor bshad// bum pa chus dgang rin chen brdar// yang snying bdun brjod bdud rtsir brlab// rigs drug dzam+b+ha lhar bsam ste/ khyor bdun phul na dbul ba sel// rang gi dri chu bdud rtsir brlab// btang

bas yi dgas nor lha mchod// rang byung ye shes chu rgyun gyi// re dogs yi dgas dbyings su bskang// tshogs rdzogs bsod nams mchog thob nges// de nas ldang ba'i rnal 'byor bshad// 'gro don rims kyis bya bsam pas/ gos tshags bya zhing rim gyis ldang// cig car 'gro ba 'dul bsam pas// chas dang ldan pas cig car ldang/ yang na skad cig lhar gsal bas// 'gro kun bsgral phyir ldang bar bya// de yang chos sku bkag langs su// 'gro don 'gag med rtsal dbang sgyur// ldang ba don dang mthun par nges// de nas 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor bshad// gang du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor yang// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro bsgom// bdag la chos skyong tshogs bskor nas// 'gro don skor ba'i bsam pas bgrod/ kha ni gang du lta phyogs der// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sar bgrod bsam// yang na chos nyid nam mkha' la// rig pa'i ye shes shugs kyi 'gro// 'gro ba don dang ldan par nges// de nas 'dug pa'i rnal 'byor bshad// phyi nang sa phyogs gar 'dug kyang// don med bya ba smra brjod spang// lus dal ngag sems dben rten zhing// dran dang shes bzhin bag yod 'dug gar gnas gzhal yas khang gsal zhing// lha yi rnal 'byor chen por gnas// yang na snyems brel 'dzin med ngang// gsal la ma yengs dran med du// gnas pas 'dug kyang don ldan nges// de nas nyal ba'i rnal 'byor bshad// gang du nyal yang tha mal gyi// ngang la shes pa rang sos glod// mnyam nyid dmigs gtad med pa yis// ngang la ma yengs phying gis gtad// yang na shes bya ye shes kyis// bum par bsdus te lhar gsal gdab// bde ba chen po'i gzims mal du// chos sku de bzhin nyid ngang nyal// nyal ba byang chub lam du nges// de nas rmi lam rnal 'byor bshad// srod la rnal 'byor rtse gcig bsdu// thams cad rmi lam yin pa'i phyir// chos kun rmi lam lta bur bsam// rmi lam ngos bzung 'dun pa bskyed// rmi lam rmi lam du shes na// bag chags 'khrul pa gtan nas 'jig/ tho rangs gnyid song da ltar gyi// snang ba rmi lam rang bzhin med// rmi lam lam gyi chog tu nges// de nas lam gsum rnal 'byor bshad// 'byung dang 'byung gyur snang srid rnams// ye nas rang byung thugs rje che// rigs lnga yab yum rol pa ste// snang ba sku ru lam khyer bya// de phyir grag stong sgra rnams gsung// grag tshad yang snying gsung du re// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs rang sems// dran rtog rang grol thugs su bkyer// snang grag rtog tshogs grol bar nges// de nas yang snying 'khrul mig bshad// yig bdun oM hUM klad skor gnyis// oM dang hUM zhes ngar bzlas na// bdag don nyan

rang bzlas pa ste// hri bzhag phyi yi bzlas brjod yin// oM dang hUM zhes mar bzlas na// gzhan don ngag gi bzlas par bsam/ oM hUM bdag gzhan zung 'jug yin// oM dang hUM yang de bzhin zab// srog ldan rab tu gsal bar nges// e ma yig bdun bde gsheg srog/ ji ltar brjod kyang thugs rje che// bklags pas 'grub pa kho na ste// 'di las khyad par sngags med do// zhe bka' stsal to// thugs rje chen po thams cad kyi yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsang rgyud las// 'gro ba 'dul ba las tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi gsol pa// kye ho ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyu don gsang ba'i lung gang lags// 'gro don mthar phyin spyad pa'i phyir// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rigs 'dus sprul pa'i 'khor// rgyud don mthar thug bstan lung gi/ chos la bdun te bstan dus dang/ snod ldan man ngag skyob tshul dang// sgrub gnas bsgrub lug gtad rgya te// thog mar rgyu bsnyan dus lung ni// ma 'ongs rtsod ldan snyigs ma'i tshe// mi khom brgyad kyis 'gro ba sdug/ nyams thag snying rje'i dus su bstan// rgyud 'dzin snod ldan skyes bu ni// 'gro phan byams thugs snyi rjer ldan// blo chen blo brtan shes rab gsal// dad rtson rdzu 'phrul rig pa can/ thabs khas ngang tshul bzang la bstan// man ngag rgyud don sa pa ni// 'phags pa'i gsung mchog seng ge sgra// bdud dang mu stegs ri dgas 'joms// don yod bzhag pa rnam par rgyal// yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas phyir// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di brjod do// oM AHhUM swA hA hri praM// oM badzra kro ta kye ma kye// ri ka ri mas ta b+ha li ma tsa ti a ta rka i ka ra su li b+ha sa ta ye/ ni la ni la ka ya b+hi shin dz+dza// phung po'i bdud 'joms seng ge sgra'o// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA mu tra a yu mu tra dz+nyA na a dzi pa ra na/ sa ma d+hi hUM spa ra na phaT swA hA// nyon mongs bdud 'joms seng ge sgra'o// oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da yi hUM/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT// dga' byed bdud 'joms seng ge sgra'o// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hri/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pany+tsa oM a yu dz+nyA na ma hA puN+ya tiSh+Tha oM/ 'chi bdag bdud 'joms seng ge sgra'o// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri// 'khor ba dong sprugs seng ge sgra'o// a+yoM mye gi r+yi hri/ a+yoM mya ki r+yiki r+yi h+yi// smyes t+yi b+hi bA+ai l+yi s+ya myi s+t+ya mu ne ts+ya rkya su g+he ye/ b+h+yi t+yi s+ya n+ya 'byong 'ag+hu yIya/ gyi r+yi b+h+ya ga ri b+ha ko/ na mo h+ya ri bye to naM s+ya ro l+Yi hi s+ye naM mu/ khya ro t+ya ke l+ya s+ya mo b+hud r+ya to mo go ts+ya ra s+t+yam/ b+h+ya bya su+o rkya g+h+yo to ra// u mo sham no pya

ro n+ya/ b+h+yi h+yi t+yi su g+hu+oM ru l+yoM// mya smyin s+ya gu ni la ho yu// g+hu ro g+hog+huraM/ brlu se gu+i khye le ru nam lu+u ma// na na ro lu/ oM thaM ruM la t+yai lhuM/ a+yi thu ri l+yo t+ya l+yo/ s+yi rai snri ser snre/ b+h+yaM s+yai ri l+yaM/ pyi gyai l+yaM/ s+ye sbyi r+yi r+yi l+yI l+ye' u+i U+i mru+o mai r+yI rA+orU/ thugs rje'i rgyal po seng ge sgra// gsang ba ring bsrel snying po'o// 'gro ba skyob tshul 'di lta ste// rgyud don gsang 'dus snying po 'di'o// rin chen gser gyi legs bris nas// gang gis 'chang ngam mthong thos rung// mchod rten bzhengs sam phyag 'tshal rung// 'khor lo bskor nas gtsug 'chang na// tshe zad sler skyob tshe ring 'gyur// nad gdon kun las grol 'gyur te// dpal dang bsod nams longs spyo 'phel// 'da' khar mngon par byang chub rtags// gzung 'dzin lus la sku gdug dang// 'ja' 'od ring bsrel 'byung bar nges// 'di yod 'gro ba sangs rgyas yin// chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong la// 'di las smin pa'i snying po med// ci phyir rgyal ba'i thugs rje 'dus// skal ldan 'ga' yi spyod yul las// kun gyis mthong thos ma yin no// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i smon lam tshig/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snying khrag yin// he ru ka yi rig pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas bstan pa kun gyi srog/ 'di ma rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// gcig kyang byung ba snga phyir med// dus gsum bde gshegs thugs rje sems// de nyid rig byed gsang ba'i sngags// ye shes rig pa mchog gi rgyud// man ngag snying gi dkyil du thim// rgyud 'di bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog ni// ji srid sems can 'du ba'i sar// dang pa 'dren pa'i pho brang bca'// snying rje'i gnas su chos 'khor bskor// de nas bsgrub lugs bstan pa yang// thugs rje chen po'i yang snying mchog/ ye shes rig pas bdag grol bya// grol nas 'gro ba gzhan don du// bsgrub pa bcad ldad gang 'phel bya'o// rgyud chen gtad rgyas rtsa ba yang/ gang du bstan pa'i skal ldan la// rgyu gtad de yis 'gro ba kun// gang la gang gis 'dul thabs bya// rgyud 'di rin chen sna lngas bri// gtsug gi nor bur bcang bar gyis// gang zhig blo chung blo dman dang// dad brtson snying rje gtad med cing// bla ma mi 'khur chos brgyad can// dam med rnams la rgyas btab bo// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun// thugs rje chen por ma gyur med// thugs rje chen po thams cad kun// yang snying rgyud 'dir ma 'dus med// 'di ni ye shes rig pa mchog/ 'gro ba'i sems la ye gsang gab// 'brel dang ma tshang med pas rgyud// skal ldan thugs su gtad do rgya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas// thugs rje chen po rigs 'dus sprul pa'i khor rnams rang la rang thugs rje chen por

yi rang te// 'gro don lhun grub tu dgyes par spyod do// thugs rje chen po thamasacad kyi yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsang rgyud las// bstan pa lung gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// thugs rje chen po thams cad kyi yang snying 'dus pa ye shes rig pa mchog gi gsang rgyud ces bya ba// oD+yan gyi mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi lho brag 'kho mthing lha khang du sgra rang 'gyu?r du bsgyur te kar chag la phab pa/ a+thi+-i/ skal ldan thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa dngos cig dang 'phrad par shog cig/ dpal gyi phug rings dal 'og bse sgrom smug por a thaM/ rgya rgya rgya/ gter ston chos dbang gis gter nas gdan drangs pa'o////
